68using namespace AscEmu::Packets;

70using AscEmu::World::Spell::Helpers::decimalToMask;
71
72Player* Aura::GetPlayerCaster()
73{
74 //caster and target are the same
75 if (m_casterGuid == m_target->getGuid())
76 {
77 if (m_target->isPlayer())
78 return static_cast<Player*>(m_target);
79
80 return nullptr;
81 }
82
83 if (m_target->getWorldMap())
84 return m_target->getWorldMap()->getPlayer(WoWGuid::getGuidLowPartFromUInt64(m_casterGuid));
85
86 return nullptr;
87}
88
89Unit* Aura::GetUnitTarget()
90{
91 if (m_target && m_target->getWorldMap())
92 return m_target;
93
94 return nullptr;
95}
96
97Player* Aura::GetPlayerTarget()
98{
99 if (p_target && p_target->getWorldMap())
100 return p_target;
101
102 return nullptr;
103}
104
105bool Aura::IsPassive() const { if (!m_spellInfo) return false; return (m_spellInfo->isPassive() && !m_areaAura); }
106
107Unit* Aura::GetUnitCaster()
108{
109 if (m_casterGuid == m_target->getGuid())
110 return m_target;
111
112 if (m_target->getWorldMap())
113 return m_target->getWorldMap()->getUnit(m_casterGuid);
114
115 return nullptr;
116}
117
118Aura::Aura(SpellInfo const* proto, int32_t duration, Object* caster, Unit* target, bool temporary, Item* i_caster)
119{
120 m_castInDuel = false;
121 m_temporary = temporary; // Aura saving related
122 m_deleted = false;
123 m_ignoreunapply = false;
124
125 if (i_caster != nullptr)
126 {
127 m_castedItemId = i_caster->getItemProperties()->ItemId;
128 itemCasterGUID = i_caster->getGuid();
129 }
130 else
131 {
132 m_castedItemId = 0;
133 itemCasterGUID = 0;
134 }
135
136 // Modifies current aura duration based on its mechanic type
137 if (p_target && getMaxDuration() > 0)
138 {
139 int32_t DurationModifier = p_target->m_mechanicDurationPctMod[Spell::GetMechanic(proto)];
140 if (DurationModifier < -100)
141 DurationModifier = -100; // Can't reduce by more than 100%
142 setMaxDuration((getMaxDuration() * (100 + DurationModifier)) / 100);
143 }
144
145 // SetCasterFaction(caster->getServersideFaction());
146
147 // m_auraSlot = 0;
148 m_dynamicValue = 0;
149 m_areaAura = false;
150
151 if (caster->isCreatureOrPlayer())
152 {
153 if (p_target && caster->isPlayer())
154 {
155 if (p_target->getDuelPlayer() == static_cast<Player*>(caster))
156 {
157 m_castInDuel = true;
158 }
159 }
160 }
161
162 m_visualSlot = 0xFF;
163 pSpellId = 0;
164 // sLogger.info("Aura::Constructor {} ({}) from {}.", m_spellProto->getId(), m_spellProto->Name, m_target->getGuidLow());
165 m_auraSlot = 0xffff;
166 m_interrupted = -1;
167 m_flags = 0;
168
169 m_casterfaction = 0;
170
171 // APGL End
172 // MIT Start
173 //\todo Zyres: We should create Auras in a function to check these pointers. To assert in a constructor after using at least on of the pointers before is bad codestyle ;)
174 ASSERT(target != nullptr && proto != nullptr);
175
176 m_spellInfo = proto;
177 m_casterGuid = caster->getGuid();
178 m_target = target;
179 if (m_target->isPlayer())
180 p_target = dynamic_cast<Player*>(m_target);
181
182 mPositive = !getSpellInfo()->isNegativeAura();
183
184 // Initialize aura charges
185 auto charges = getSpellInfo()->getProcCharges();
186 if (caster->isCreatureOrPlayer())
187 static_cast<Unit*>(caster)->applySpellModifiers(SPELLMOD_CHARGES, &charges, getSpellInfo(), nullptr, this);
188
189 m_charges = static_cast<uint16_t>(charges);
190 m_originalCharges = m_charges;
191
192 m_updatingModifiers = true;
193
194 // Initialize aura effect variables
195 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
196 {
197 m_auraEffects[i].setAuraEffectType(SPELL_AURA_NONE);
198 m_auraEffects[i].setEffectDamage(0.0f);
199 m_auraEffects[i].setEffectBaseDamage(0);
200 m_auraEffects[i].setEffectFixedDamage(0);
201 m_auraEffects[i].setEffectMiscValue(0);
202 m_auraEffects[i].setEffectAmplitude(0);
203 m_auraEffects[i].setEffectDamageFraction(0.0f);
204 m_auraEffects[i].setEffectPercentModifier(1.0f);
205 m_auraEffects[i].setEffectDamageStatic(false);
206 m_auraEffects[i].setEffectIndex(0);
207 m_auraEffects[i].setAura(nullptr);
208
209 // Initialize periodic timer
210 m_periodicTimer[i] = 0;
211 }
212
213 if (!IsPassive())
214 m_originalDuration = duration;
215
216 _calculateSpellPowerBonus();
217 _calculateAttackPowerBonus();
218 _calculateSpellHaste();
219 _calculateCritChance();
220
221 // Set duration after haste calculation
222 setMaxDuration(static_cast<int32_t>(m_originalDuration * m_spellHaste));
223 setTimeLeft(getMaxDuration());
224
225 // Call aura script hook
226 sScriptMgr.callScriptedAuraOnCreate(this);
227
228 // MIT End
229 // APGL Start
230}
231
232Aura::~Aura()
233{
234 sEventMgr.RemoveEvents(this);
235 m_usedModifiers.clear();
236}
237
238void Aura::EventUpdateGroupAA(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, float r)
239{
240 Player* owner = m_target->getPlayerOwnerOrSelf();
241 if (owner == nullptr)
242 {
243 targets.clear();
244 return;
245 }
246
247 if (!owner->isInGroup())
248 {
249 if (m_target->getGuid() != owner->getGuid())
250 {
251 if ((m_target->getDistanceSq(owner) <= r))
252 {
253 if (!owner->hasAurasWithId(m_spellInfo->getId()))
254 targets.insert(owner->getGuid());
255 }
256 else
257 {
258 if (owner->hasAurasWithId(m_spellInfo->getId()))
259 {
260 targets.erase(owner->getGuidLow());
261 owner->removeAllAurasById(m_spellInfo->getId());
262 }
263 }
264 }
265 }
266 else
267 {
268 owner->getGroup()->Lock();
269
270 SubGroup* sg = owner->getGroup()->GetSubGroup(owner->getSubGroupSlot());
271 for (const auto cachedCharacterInfo : sg->getGroupMembers())
272 {
273 Player* op = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(cachedCharacterInfo->guid);
274
275 if (op == nullptr)
276 continue;
277
278 if (m_target->getDistanceSq(op) > r)
279 continue;
280
281 if (m_target->GetInstanceID() != op->GetInstanceID())
282 continue;
283
284 if ((m_target->GetPhase() & op->GetPhase()) == 0)
285 continue;
286
287 if (!op->isAlive())
288 continue;
289
290 if (op->hasAurasWithId(m_spellInfo->getId()))
291 continue;
292
293 targets.insert(op->getGuid());
294 }
295
296 owner->getGroup()->Unlock();
297 }
298
299 for (AreaAuraList::iterator itr = targets.begin(); itr != targets.end();)
300 {
301 AreaAuraList::iterator itr2 = itr;
302 ++itr;
303
304 Player* tp = m_target->getWorldMap()->getPlayer(WoWGuid::getGuidLowPartFromUInt64(*itr2));
305
306 bool removable = false;
307 if (tp == nullptr)
308 {
309 targets.erase(itr2);
310 continue;
311 }
312
313 if (m_target->getDistanceSq(tp) > r)
314 removable = true;
315
316 if ((m_target->GetPhase() & tp->GetPhase()) == 0)
317 removable = true;
318
319 if ((tp->getGuid() != owner->getGuid()) && !tp->isInGroup())
320 removable = true;
321 else
322 {
323 if (owner->isInGroup())
324 {
325 if (owner->getGroup()->GetID() != tp->getGroup()->GetID())
326 removable = true;
327
328 if (owner->getSubGroupSlot() != tp->getSubGroupSlot())
329 removable = true;
330 }
331 }
332
333 if (removable)
334 {
335 targets.erase(itr2);
336 tp->removeAllAurasById(m_spellInfo->getId());
337 }
338 }
339}
340
341void Aura::EventUpdateRaidAA(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, float r)
342{
343 Player* owner = m_target->getPlayerOwnerOrSelf();
344 if (owner == nullptr)
345 {
346 targets.clear();
347 return;
348 }
349
350 if (!owner->isInGroup())
351 {
352 if (m_target->getGuid() != owner->getGuid())
353 {
354 if ((m_target->getDistanceSq(owner) <= r))
355 {
356 if (!owner->hasAurasWithId(m_spellInfo->getId()))
357 targets.insert(owner->getGuid());
358 }
359 else
360 {
361 if (owner->hasAurasWithId(m_spellInfo->getId()))
362 {
363 targets.erase(owner->getGuidLow());
364 owner->removeAllAurasById(m_spellInfo->getId());
365 }
366 }
367 }
368
369 }
370 else
371 {
372 const auto group = owner->getGroup();
373
374 group->Lock();
375
376 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < group->GetSubGroupCount(); i++)
377 {
378 SubGroup* sg = group->GetSubGroup(i);
379
380 for (const auto& cachedCharacterInfo : sg->getGroupMembers())
381 {
382 Player* op = sObjectMgr.getPlayer(cachedCharacterInfo->guid);
383
384 if (op == nullptr)
385 continue;
386
387 if (op->GetInstanceID() != m_target->GetInstanceID())
388 continue;
389
390 if (m_target->getDistanceSq(op) > r)
391 continue;
392
393 if ((m_target->GetPhase() & op->GetPhase()) == 0)
394 continue;
395
396 if (!op->isAlive())
397 continue;
398
399 if (op->hasAurasWithId(m_spellInfo->getId()))
400 continue;
401
402 targets.insert(op->getGuid());
403 }
404 }
405
406 group->Unlock();
407 }
408
409 // Check for targets that should be no longer affected
410 for (AreaAuraList::iterator itr = targets.begin(); itr != targets.end();)
411 {
412 AreaAuraList::iterator itr2 = itr;
413 ++itr;
414
415 Player* tp = m_target->getWorldMap()->getPlayer(WoWGuid::getGuidLowPartFromUInt64(*itr2));
416 bool removable = false;
417
418 if (tp == nullptr)
419 {
420 targets.erase(itr2);
421 continue;
422 }
423
424 if (m_target->getDistanceSq(tp) > r)
425 removable = true;
426
427 if ((m_target->GetPhase() & tp->GetPhase()) == 0)
428 removable = true;
429
430 if ((tp->getGuid() != owner->getGuid()) && !tp->isInGroup())
431 removable = true;
432
433 if (removable)
434 {
435 targets.erase(itr2);
436 tp->removeAllAurasById(m_spellInfo->getId());
437 }
438 }
439}
440
441void Aura::EventUpdatePetAA(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, float r)
442{
443 const auto pet = m_target->getPet();
444 if (pet == nullptr)
445 return;
446
447 if (m_target->getDistanceSq(pet) > r)
448 {
449 pet->removeAllAurasByIdForGuid(m_spellInfo->getId(), m_target->getGuid());
450 }
451 else
452 {
453 if (pet->isAlive() && pet->getAuraWithIdForGuid(m_spellInfo->getId(), m_target->getGuid()) == nullptr)
454 {
455 auto a = sSpellMgr.newAura(m_spellInfo, getTimeLeft(), m_target, pet, true);
456 a->m_areaAura = true;
457 a->addAuraEffect(aurEff->getAuraEffectType(), aurEff->getEffectDamage(), aurEff->getEffectMiscValue(), aurEff->getEffectPercentModifier(), true, aurEff->getEffectIndex());
458 pet->addAura(std::move(a));
459 }
460 }
461}
462
463void Aura::EventUpdateFriendAA(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, float r)
464{
465 Unit* u = m_target;
466 if (u == nullptr)
467 return;
468
469 for (const auto& itr : u->getInRangeObjectsSet())
470 {
471 Object* o = itr;
472
473 if (!o || !o->isCreatureOrPlayer())
474 continue;
475
476 Unit* ou = static_cast<Unit*>(o);
477
478 if (u->getDistanceSq(ou) > r)
479 continue;
480
481 if ((u->GetPhase() & ou->GetPhase()) == 0)
482 continue;
483
484 if (!ou->isAlive())
485 continue;
486
487 if (u->isHostileTo(ou))
488 continue;
489
490 if (u->isNeutralTo(ou))
491 continue;
492
493 if (ou->hasAurasWithId(m_spellInfo->getId()))
494 continue;
495
496 targets.insert(ou->getGuid());
497 }
498
499 for (AreaAuraList::iterator itr = targets.begin(); itr != targets.end();)
500 {
501 AreaAuraList::iterator itr2 = itr;
502 ++itr;
503
504 Unit* tu = u->getWorldMap()->getUnit(*itr2);
505 bool removable = false;
506
507 if (tu == nullptr)
508 {
509 targets.erase(itr2);
510 continue;
511 }
512
513 if (u->getDistanceSq(tu) > r)
514 removable = true;
515
516 if (u->isHostileTo(tu))
517 removable = true;
518
519 if (u->isNeutralTo(tu))
520 removable = true;
521
522 if ((u->GetPhase() & tu->GetPhase()) == 0)
523 removable = true;
524
525 if (removable)
526 {
527 tu->removeAllAurasById(m_spellInfo->getId());
528 targets.erase(itr2);
529 }
530 }
531}
532
533void Aura::EventUpdateEnemyAA(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, float r)
534{
535 Unit* u = m_target;
536 if (u == nullptr)
537 return;
538
539 for (const auto& itr : u->getInRangeObjectsSet())
540 {
541 Object* o = itr;
542
543 if (!o || !o->isCreatureOrPlayer())
544 continue;
545
546 Unit* ou = static_cast<Unit*>(o);
547
548 if (u->getDistanceSq(ou) > r)
549 continue;
550
551 if ((u->GetPhase() & ou->GetPhase()) == 0)
552 continue;
553
554 if (!ou->isAlive())
555 continue;
556
557 if (!u->isHostileTo(ou))
558 continue;
559
560 if (ou->hasAurasWithId(m_spellInfo->getId()))
561 continue;
562
563 targets.insert(ou->getGuid());
564 }
565
566 for (AreaAuraList::iterator itr = targets.begin(); itr != targets.end();)
567 {
568 AreaAuraList::iterator itr2 = itr;
569 ++itr;
570
571 Unit* tu = u->getWorldMap()->getUnit(*itr2);
572 bool removable = false;
573
574 if (tu == nullptr)
575 {
576 targets.erase(itr2);
577 continue;
578 }
579
580 if (u->getDistanceSq(tu) > r)
581 removable = true;
582
583 if (!u->isHostileTo(tu))
584 removable = true;
585
586 if (u->isNeutralTo(tu))
587 removable = true;
588
589 if ((u->GetPhase() & tu->GetPhase()) == 0)
590 removable = true;
591
592 if (removable)
593 {
594 tu->removeAllAurasById(m_spellInfo->getId());
595 targets.erase(itr2);
596 }
597 }
598}
599
600void Aura::EventUpdateOwnerAA(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, float r)
601{
602 Object* o = getOwner();
603 if (!o->isCreature())
604 return;
605
606 Creature* c = static_cast<Creature*>(o);
607 if (!c->isSummon())
608 return;
609
610 Unit* ou = nullptr;
611 ou = static_cast< Summon* >(c)->getUnitOwner();
612
613 if (ou == nullptr)
614 return;
615
616 if (ou->isAlive() &&
617 !ou->hasAurasWithId(m_spellInfo->getId()) &&
618 (c->getDistanceSq(ou) <= r))
619 {
620
621 auto a = sSpellMgr.newAura(m_spellInfo, getTimeLeft(), c, ou, true);
622 a->m_areaAura = true;
623 a->addAuraEffect(aurEff->getAuraEffectType(), aurEff->getEffectDamage(), aurEff->getEffectMiscValue(), aurEff->getEffectPercentModifier(), true, aurEff->getEffectIndex());
624 ou->addAura(std::move(a));
625 }
626
627
628 if (!ou->isAlive() || (c->getDistanceSq(ou) > r))
629 ou->removeAllAurasById(m_spellInfo->getId());
630}
631
632void Aura::EventUpdateAreaAura(uint8_t effIndex, float r)
633{
634 /* burlex: cheap hack to get this to execute in the correct context always */
635 if (event_GetCurrentInstanceId() == -1)
636 {
637 event_Relocate();
638 return;
639 }
640
641 Unit* u_caster = GetUnitCaster();
642
643 // if the caster is no longer valid->remove the aura
644 if (u_caster == nullptr)
645 {
646 removeAura();
647 //since we lost the caster we cannot do anything more
648 return;
649 }
650
651 // Do not update area aura if caster is not in world yet
652 if (!u_caster->IsInWorld())
653 return;
654
655 uint32_t AreaAuraEffectId = m_spellInfo->getAreaAuraEffect();
656
657 switch (AreaAuraEffectId)
658 {
659
660 case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_GROUP_AREA_AURA:
661 EventUpdateGroupAA(&m_auraEffects[effIndex], r);
662 break;
663
664 case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_RAID_AREA_AURA:
665 EventUpdateRaidAA(&m_auraEffects[effIndex], r);
666 break;
667
668 case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_PET_AREA_AURA:
669 EventUpdatePetAA(&m_auraEffects[effIndex], r);
670 break;
671
672 case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_FRIEND_AREA_AURA:
673 EventUpdateFriendAA(&m_auraEffects[effIndex], r);
674 break;
675
676 case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_ENEMY_AREA_AURA:
677 EventUpdateEnemyAA(&m_auraEffects[effIndex], r);
678 break;
679
680#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC
681 case SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_OWNER_AREA_AURA:
682 EventUpdateOwnerAA(&m_auraEffects[effIndex], r);
683 break;
684#endif
685
686 default:
687 sLogger.failure("Spell {} ({}) has tried to update Area Aura targets but Spell has no valid Area Aura effect {}.", m_spellInfo->getId(), m_spellInfo->getName(), AreaAuraEffectId);
688 return;
689 }
690
691 for (AreaAuraList::iterator itr = targets.begin(); itr != targets.end(); ++itr)
692 {
693 auto unit = m_target->getWorldMap()->getUnit(*itr);
694 if (unit == nullptr)
695 return;
696
697 if (unit->hasAurasWithId(m_spellInfo->getId()))
698 continue;
699
700 auto a = sSpellMgr.newAura(m_spellInfo, getTimeLeft(), m_target, unit, true);
701 a->m_areaAura = true;
702 a->addAuraEffect(m_auraEffects[effIndex].getAuraEffectType(), m_auraEffects[effIndex].getEffectDamage(), m_auraEffects[effIndex].getEffectMiscValue(), m_auraEffects[effIndex].getEffectPercentModifier(), true, m_auraEffects[effIndex].getEffectIndex());
703 unit->addAura(std::move(a));
704 }
705}
706
707void Aura::ClearAATargets()
708{
709 uint32_t spellid = m_spellInfo->getId();
710
711 for (AreaAuraList::iterator itr = targets.begin(); itr != targets.end(); ++itr)
712 {
713 Unit* tu = m_target->getWorldMap()->getUnit(*itr);
714
715 if (tu == nullptr)
716 continue;
717
718 tu->removeAllAurasById(spellid);
719 }
720 targets.clear();
721
722 if (m_spellInfo->hasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_PET_AREA_AURA))
723 {
724 if (auto* const pet = m_target->getPet())
725 pet->removeAllAurasByIdForGuid(spellid, m_target->getGuid());
726 }
727
728#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC
729 if (m_spellInfo->hasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_OWNER_AREA_AURA))
730 {
731 Unit* u = m_target->getWorldMap()->getUnit(m_target->getCreatedByGuid());
732
733 if (u != nullptr)
734 u->removeAllAurasById(spellid);
735
736 }
737#endif
738}
739
740//------------------------- Aura Effects -----------------------------
741
742void Aura::SpellAuraModBaseResistance(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
743{
744 SpellAuraModResistance(aurEff, apply);
745 //both add/decrease some resistance difference is unknown
746}
747
748void Aura::SpellAuraModBaseResistancePerc(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
749{
750 uint32_t Flag = aurEff->getEffectMiscValue();
751 int32_t amt;
752 if (apply)
753 {
754 amt = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
755 if (amt > 0)
756 mPositive = true;
757 else
758 mPositive = false;
759 }
760 else
761 amt = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
762
763 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < TOTAL_SPELL_SCHOOLS; x++)
764 {
765 if (Flag & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
766 {
767 if (m_target->isPlayer())
768 {
769 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0)
770 {
771 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_baseResistanceModPctPos[x] += amt;
772 }
773 else
774 {
775 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_baseResistanceModPctNeg[x] -= amt;
776 }
777 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->calcResistance(x);
778
779 }
780 else if (m_target->isCreature())
781 {
782 static_cast< Creature* >(m_target)->BaseResistanceModPct[x] += amt;
783 static_cast< Creature* >(m_target)->CalcResistance(x);
784 }
785 }
786 }
787}
788
789void Aura::SpellAuraBindSight(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
790{
791 mPositive = true;
792 // MindVision
793 Player* caster = GetPlayerCaster();
794 if (caster == nullptr)
795 return;
796
797 if (apply)
798 caster->setFarsightGuid(m_target->getGuid());
799 else
800 caster->setFarsightGuid(0);
801}
802
803void Aura::SpellAuraModPossess(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
804{
805 Unit* caster = GetPlayerCaster();
806
807 if (apply)
808 {
809 if (caster != nullptr && caster->IsInWorld())
810 caster->possess(m_target);
811 }
812 else
813 {
814 if (caster != nullptr && caster->IsInWorld())
815 {
816 caster->unPossess();
817 m_target->removeAllAurasById(getSpellId());
818 }
819
820 // make sure Player::UnPossess() didn't fail, if it did we will just free the target here
821 if (m_target->getCharmedByGuid() != 0)
822 {
823 if (m_target->isCreature())
824 {
825 m_target->setAItoUse(true);
826 m_target->m_redirectSpellPackets = nullptr;
827 }
828
829 m_target->setCharmedByGuid(0);
830 m_target->removeUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_PLAYER_CONTROLLED_CREATURE | UNIT_FLAG_PVP_ATTACKABLE);
831 m_target->setFaction(m_target->getCharmTempVal());
832 m_target->updateInRangeOppositeFactionSet();
833 }
834 else
835 {
836 //mob woke up and realized he was controlled. He will turn to controller and also notify the other mobs he is fighting that they should attack the caster
837 //sadly i got only 3 test cases about this so i might be wrong :(
838 //zack : disabled until tested
839 m_target->getAIInterface()->eventChangeFaction(caster);
840 }
841 }
842}
843
844void Aura::SpellAuraModConfuse(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
845{
846 Unit* u_caster = GetUnitCaster();
847
848 if (m_target->isTotem())
849 return;
850
851 if (apply)
852 {
853 if (u_caster == nullptr) return;
854
855 // Check Mechanic Immunity
856 if (m_target->m_mechanicsDispels[MECHANIC_DISORIENTED]
857 || (m_spellInfo->getMechanicsType() == MECHANIC_POLYMORPHED && m_target->m_mechanicsDispels[MECHANIC_POLYMORPHED])
858 )
859 {
860 m_flags |= 1 << aurEff->getEffectIndex();
861 return;
862 }
863 mPositive = false;
864 m_target->addUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_CONFUSED);
865 m_target->interruptSpell();
866
867 m_target->setAItoUse(true);
868 m_target->setControlled(true, UNIT_STATE_CONFUSED);
869 m_target->getThreatManager().evaluateSuppressed();
870
871 if (p_target)
872 {
873 // this is a hackfix to stop player from moving -> see AIInterface::_UpdateMovement() Wander AI for more info
874 p_target->sendClientControlPacket(m_target, 0);
875
876 p_target->speedCheatDelay(getTimeLeft());
877 }
878 }
879 else if ((m_flags & (1 << aurEff->getEffectIndex())) == 0) //add these checks to mods where immunity can cancel only 1 mod and not whole spell
880 {
881 m_target->setControlled(false, UNIT_STATE_CONFUSED);
882 m_target->removeUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_CONFUSED);
883 if (p_target)
884 p_target->speedCheatReset();
885
886 if (p_target)
887 {
888 // re-enable movement
889 p_target->sendClientControlPacket(m_target, 1);
890
891 m_target->setAItoUse(false);
892 }
893 else
894 {
895 m_target->getAIInterface()->onHostileAction(u_caster);
896 }
897 }
898}
899
900void Aura::SpellAuraModCharm(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
901{
902 Player* caster = GetPlayerCaster();
903 if (caster == nullptr)
904 return;
905 if (!m_target->isCreature())
906 return;
907
908 Creature* target = static_cast< Creature* >(m_target);
909
910 if (target->isTotem())
911 return;
912
913 mPositive = true; //we ignore the other 2 effect of this spell and force it to be a positive spell
914
915 if (apply)
916 {
917 if ((int32_t)m_target->getLevel() > aurEff->getEffectDamage() || m_target->isPet())
918 return;
919
920 // this should be done properly
921 if (target->GetEnslaveCount() >= 10)
922 return;
923
924 if (caster->getCharmGuid() != 0)
925 return;
926
927 m_target->addUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_CHARMED);
928 m_target->setCharmTempVal(m_target->getFactionTemplate());
929 m_target->setFaction(caster->getFactionTemplate());
930 m_target->updateInRangeOppositeFactionSet();
931 m_target->getAIInterface()->Init(m_target, caster);
932 m_target->setCharmedByGuid(caster->getGuid());
933 caster->setCharmGuid(target->getGuid());
934 //damn it, the other effects of enslave demon will agro him on us anyway :S
935 m_target->getThreatManager().clearAllThreat();
936
937 target->SetEnslaveCount(target->GetEnslaveCount() + 1);
938
939 if (caster->getSession()) // crashfix
940 {
941 target->sendSpellsToController(caster, getMaxDuration());
942 target->SetEnslaveSpell(m_spellInfo->getId());
943 }
944 }
945 else
946 {
947 m_target->removeUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_CHARMED);
948 m_target->setFaction(m_target->getCharmTempVal());
949 m_target->getThreatManager().clearAllThreat();
950 m_target->updateInRangeOppositeFactionSet();
951 m_target->getAIInterface()->Init(m_target);
952 m_target->setCharmedByGuid(0);
953
954 if (caster->getSession() != nullptr) // crashfix
955 {
956 caster->setCharmGuid(0);
957 caster->sendEmptyPetSpellList();
958 target->SetEnslaveSpell(0);
959 }
960 }
961}
962
963void Aura::SpellAuraModFear(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
964{
965 Unit* u_caster = GetUnitCaster();
966
967 if (m_target->isCreature() &&
968 (m_target->isTotem() || m_target->isRooted()))
969 return;
970
971 if (apply)
972 {
973 if (u_caster == nullptr) return;
974 // Check Mechanic Immunity
975 if (m_target->m_mechanicsDispels[MECHANIC_FLEEING])
976 {
977 m_flags |= 1 << aurEff->getEffectIndex();
978 return;
979 }
980
981 mPositive = false;
982 m_target->addUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_FLEEING);
983 m_target->setAItoUse(true);
984 m_target->getAIInterface()->handleEvent(EVENT_FEAR, u_caster, 0);
985 m_target->m_fearModifiers++;
986 if (p_target)
987 {
988 // this is a hackfix to stop player from moving -> see AIInterface::_UpdateMovement() Fear AI for more info
989 p_target->sendClientControlPacket(m_target, 0);
990
991 p_target->speedCheatDelay(getTimeLeft());
992 }
993 }
994 else if ((m_flags & (1 << aurEff->getEffectIndex())) == 0) //add these checks to mods where immunity can cancel only 1 mod and not whole spell
995 {
996 m_target->m_fearModifiers--;
997
998 if (m_target->m_fearModifiers <= 0)
999 {
1000 m_target->removeUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_FLEEING);
1001 m_target->getAIInterface()->handleEvent(EVENT_UNFEAR, nullptr, 0);
1002
1003 if (p_target)
1004 {
1005 // re-enable movement
1006 p_target->sendClientControlPacket(m_target, 1);
1007
1008 m_target->setAItoUse(false);
1009 p_target->speedCheatReset();
1010 }
1011 else
1012 {
1013 m_target->getAIInterface()->onHostileAction(u_caster);
1014 }
1015 }
1016 }
1017}
1018
1019void Aura::SpellAuraModAttackSpeed(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
1020{
1021 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() < 0)
1022 mPositive = false;
1023 else
1024 mPositive = true;
1025
1026 if (apply)
1027 {
1028 m_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(MELEE, aurEff->getEffectDamage());
1029 //\ todo: confirm this for other versions!
1030#if VERSION_STRING == Classic
1031 m_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(OFFHAND, aurEff->getEffectDamage());
1032 m_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(RANGED, aurEff->getEffectDamage());
1033#endif
1034 }
1035 else
1036 {
1037 m_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(MELEE, -aurEff->getEffectDamage());
1038 //\ todo: confirm this for other versions!
1039#if VERSION_STRING == Classic
1040 m_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(OFFHAND, -aurEff->getEffectDamage());
1041 m_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(RANGED, -aurEff->getEffectDamage());
1042#endif
1043 }
1044
1045 if (m_target->isPlayer())
1046 static_cast<Player*>(m_target)->updateStats();
1047}
1048
1049void Aura::SpellAuraModThreatGenerated(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
1050{
1051 aurEff->getEffectDamage() < 0 ? mPositive = true : mPositive = false;
1052 for (uint32_t x = 0; x < 7; x++)
1053 {
1054 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
1055 {
1056 if (apply)
1057 m_target->modGeneratedThreatModifyer(x, aurEff->getEffectDamage());
1058 else
1059 m_target->modGeneratedThreatModifyer(x, -(aurEff->getEffectDamage()));
1060 }
1061 }
1062}
1063
1064void Aura::SpellAuraModTaunt(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool /*apply*/)
1065{
1066 Unit* m_caster = GetUnitCaster();
1067
1068 if (!m_caster || !m_caster->isAlive() || !m_target->isAlive() || !m_target->getThreatManager().canHaveThreatList())
1069 return;
1070
1071 mPositive = false;
1072
1073 m_target->getThreatManager().tauntUpdate();
1074}
1075
1076void Aura::SpellAuraModDetaunt(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool /*apply*/)
1077{
1078 Unit* caster = GetUnitCaster();
1079
1080 if (!caster || !caster->isAlive() || !m_target->isAlive() || !caster->getThreatManager().canHaveThreatList())
1081 return;
1082
1083 caster->getThreatManager().tauntUpdate();
1084}
1085
1086void Aura::SpellAuraModStun(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
1087{
1088 if (apply)
1089 {
1090 // Check Mechanic Immunity
1091 // Stun is a tricky one... it's used for all different kinds of mechanics as a base Aura
1092
1093 switch (m_spellInfo->getId())
1094 {
1095 //SPELL_HASH_ICE_BLOCK
1096 case 27619:
1097 case 36911:
1098 case 41590:
1099 case 45438:
1100 case 45776:
1101 case 46604:
1102 case 46882:
1103 case 56124:
1104 case 56644:
1105 case 62766:
1106 case 65802:
1107 case 69924:
1108 break;
1109 default:
1110 {
1111 if (isNegative()) // ice block stuns you, don't want our own spells to ignore stun effects
1112 {
1113 if ((m_spellInfo->getMechanicsType() == MECHANIC_CHARMED && m_target->m_mechanicsDispels[MECHANIC_CHARMED])
1114 || (m_spellInfo->getMechanicsType() == MECHANIC_INCAPACIPATED && m_target->m_mechanicsDispels[MECHANIC_INCAPACIPATED])
1115
1116 || (m_spellInfo->getMechanicsType() == MECHANIC_SAPPED && m_target->m_mechanicsDispels[MECHANIC_SAPPED])
1117 || (m_target->m_mechanicsDispels[MECHANIC_STUNNED])
1118 )
1119 {
1120 m_flags |= 1 << aurEff->getEffectIndex();
1121 return;
1122 }
1123 }
1124 } break;
1125 }
1126 mPositive = false;
1127
1128 //\todo Zyres: is tis really the way this should work?
1129 m_target->m_rootCounter++;
1130
1131 if (m_target->m_rootCounter == 1)
1132 m_target->setMoveRoot(true);
1133
1134 m_target->removeAllAurasByAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOD_STEALTH);
1135
1136 m_target->m_stunned++;
1137 m_target->setControlled(true, UNIT_STATE_STUNNED);
1138 m_target->addUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_STUNNED);
1139 m_target->getThreatManager().evaluateSuppressed();
1140
1141 // remove the current spell
1142 if (m_target->isCastingSpell())
1143 {
1144 m_target->interruptSpell();
1145 }
1146
1147 //warrior talent - second wind triggers on stun and immobilize. This is not used as proc to be triggered always !
1148 Unit* caster = GetUnitCaster();
1149 if (caster != nullptr)
1150 {
1151 caster->eventStunOrImmobilize(m_target);
1152 m_target->eventStunOrImmobilize(caster, true);
1153 }
1154 }
1155 else if ((m_flags & (1 << aurEff->getEffectIndex())) == 0) //add these checks to mods where immunity can cancel only 1 mod and not whole spell
1156 {
1157 //\todo Zyres: is tis relly the way this should work?
1158 m_target->m_rootCounter--;
1159
1160 if (m_target->m_rootCounter == 0)
1161 m_target->setMoveRoot(false);
1162
1163 m_target->m_stunned--;
1164
1165 if (m_target->m_stunned == 0)
1166 {
1167 m_target->setControlled(false, UNIT_STATE_STUNNED);
1168 m_target->removeUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_STUNNED);
1169 }
1170
1171 // attack them back.. we seem to lose this sometimes for some reason
1172 if (m_target->isCreature())
1173 {
1174 Unit* target = GetUnitCaster();
1175 if (m_target->getAIInterface()->getCurrentTarget() != nullptr)
1176 target = m_target->getAIInterface()->getCurrentTarget();
1177
1178 if (target == nullptr)
1179 return;
1180
1181 m_target->getAIInterface()->onHostileAction(target, nullptr);
1182 }
1183 }
1184
1185 /*
1186 if (apply)
1187 {
1188 switch(this->m_spellProto->getId())
1189 {
1190 case 652:
1191 case 2070:
1192 case 6770:
1193 case 6771:
1194 case 11297:
1195 case 11298:
1196 {
1197 // sap
1198 Unit* c = GetUnitCaster();
1199 if (c)
1200 c->removeAllAurasByAuraInterruptFlag(AURA_INTERRUPT_ON_START_ATTACK); // remove stealth
1201 }break;
1202 case 1776:
1203 case 1777:
1204 case 1780:
1205 case 1781:
1206 case 8629:
1207 case 8630:
1208 case 11285:
1209 case 11286:
1210 case 11287:
1211 case 11288:
1212 case 12540:
1213 case 13579:
1214 case 24698:
1215 case 28456:
1216 {
1217 // gouge
1218 Unit* c = GetUnitCaster();
1219 if (c && c->getObjectTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
1220 {
1221 //TO< Player* >(c)->CombatModeDelay = 10;
1222 TO< Player* >(c)->EventAttackStop();
1223 c->smsg_AttackStop(m_target);
1224 c->removeAllAurasByAuraInterruptFlag(AURA_INTERRUPT_ON_START_ATTACK); // remove stealth
1225 }
1226 }
1227 }
1228 }*/
1229}
1230
1231void Aura::SpellAuraModDamageDone(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
1232{
1233 int32_t val;
1234
1235 if (m_target->isPlayer())
1236 {
1237 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0)
1238 {
1239 if (apply)
1240 {
1241 mPositive = true;
1242 val = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
1243 }
1244 else
1245 {
1246 val = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
1247 }
1248
1249 for (uint16_t x = 0; x < 7; ++x)
1250 {
1251 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
1252 dynamic_cast<Player*>(m_target)->modModDamageDonePositive(x, val);
1253 }
1254
1255 }
1256 else
1257 {
1258 if (apply)
1259 {
1260 mPositive = false;
1261 val = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
1262 }
1263 else
1264 {
1265 val = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
1266 }
1267
1268 for (uint16_t x = 0; x < 7; ++x)
1269 {
1270 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
1271 dynamic_cast<Player*>(m_target)->modModDamageDoneNegative(x, val);
1272 }
1273 }
1274 }
1275 else if (m_target->isCreature())
1276 {
1277 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0)
1278 {
1279 if (apply)
1280 {
1281 mPositive = true;
1282 val = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
1283 }
1284 else
1285 {
1286 val = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
1287 }
1288
1289 }
1290 else
1291 {
1292 if (apply)
1293 {
1294 mPositive = false;
1295 val = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
1296 }
1297 else
1298 {
1299 val = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
1300 }
1301 }
1302
1303 for (uint32_t x = 0; x < 7; ++x)
1304 {
1305 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
1306 static_cast< Creature* >(m_target)->ModDamageDone[x] += val;
1307 }
1308 }
1309
1310 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & 1)
1311 m_target->calculateDamage();
1312}
1313
1314void Aura::SpellAuraModDamageTaken(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
1315{
1316 int32_t val = (apply) ? aurEff->getEffectDamage() : -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
1317 for (uint32_t x = 0; x < 7; x++)
1318 {
1319 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
1320 {
1321 m_target->m_damageTakenMod[x] += val;
1322 }
1323 }
1324}
1325
1326void Aura::SpellAuraDamageShield(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
1327{
1328 if (apply)
1329 {
1330 mPositive = true;
1331 DamageProc ds;// = new DamageShield();
1332 ds.m_damage = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
1333 ds.m_spellId = getSpellInfo()->getId();
1334 ds.m_school = getSpellInfo()->getFirstSchoolFromSchoolMask();
1335 ds.m_flags = PROC_ON_TAKEN_MELEE_HIT | PROC_ON_TAKEN_MELEE_SPELL_HIT; //maybe later we might want to add other flags too here
1336 ds.owner = (void*)this;
1337 m_target->m_damageShields.push_back(ds);
1338 }
1339 else
1340 {
1341 for (std::list<struct DamageProc>::iterator i = m_target->m_damageShields.begin(); i != m_target->m_damageShields.end(); ++i)
1342 {
1343 if (i->owner == this)
1344 {
1345 m_target->m_damageShields.erase(i);
1346 return;
1347 }
1348 }
1349 }
1350}
1351
1352void Aura::SpellAuraModStealth(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
1353{
1354 if (apply)
1355 {
1356 //Overkill must proc only if we aren't already stealthed, also refreshing duration.
1357 if (!m_target->isStealthed() && m_target->hasAurasWithId(58426))
1358 {
1359 Aura *buff = m_target->getAuraWithId(58427);
1360 if (buff)
1361 {
1362 // Spell Overkill - in stealth and 20 seconds after stealth +30% energy regeneration - -1 duration => hacky infinity
1363 buff->setMaxDuration(-1);
1364 buff->refreshOrModifyStack();
1365 }
1366 else
1367 m_target->castSpell(m_target, 58427, true);
1368 }
1369
1370 if (p_target && p_target->hasBgFlag())
1371 {
1372 if (const auto battleground = p_target->getBattleground())
1373 {
1374 if (battleground->getType() == BattlegroundDef::TYPE_WARSONG_GULCH)
1375 battleground->HookOnFlagDrop(p_target);
1376
1377 if (battleground->getType() == BattlegroundDef::TYPE_EYE_OF_THE_STORM)
1378 battleground->HookOnFlagDrop(p_target);
1379 }
1380 }
1381
1382 mPositive = true;
1383 switch (m_spellInfo->getId())
1384 {
1385 //SPELL_HASH_STEALTH
1386 case 1784:
1387 case 1785:
1388 case 1786:
1389 case 1787:
1390 case 8822:
1391 case 30831:
1392 case 30991:
1393 case 31526:
1394 case 31621:
1395 case 32199:
1396 case 32615:
1397 case 34189:
1398 case 42347:
1399 case 42866:
1400 case 42943:
1401 case 52188:
1402 case 58506:
1403 m_target->setStandStateFlags(m_target->getStandStateFlags() | UNIT_STAND_FLAGS_CREEP);
1404 break;
1405 }
1406
1407 m_target->addStandStateFlags(UNIT_STAND_FLAGS_CREEP);
1408#if VERSION_STRING != Mop
1409 if (m_target->isPlayer())
1410 if (const auto player = dynamic_cast<Player*>(m_target))
1411 player->addAuraVision(AURA_VISION_STEALTH);
1412#endif
1413
1414 m_target->removeAllAurasByAuraInterruptFlag(AURA_INTERRUPT_ON_STEALTH | AURA_INTERRUPT_ON_INVINCIBLE);
1415 m_target->modStealthLevel(StealthFlag(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()), aurEff->getEffectDamage());
1416
1417 // hack fix for vanish stuff
1418 if (m_target->isPlayer()) // Vanish
1419 {
1420 switch (m_spellInfo->getId())
1421 {
1422 //SPELL_HASH_VANISH
1423 case 1856:
1424 case 1857:
1425 case 11327:
1426 case 11329:
1427 case 24223:
1428 case 24228:
1429 case 24229:
1430 case 24230:
1431 case 24231:
1432 case 24232:
1433 case 24233:
1434 case 24699:
1435 case 26888:
1436 case 26889:
1437 case 27617:
1438 case 29448:
1439 case 31619:
1440 case 35205:
1441 case 39667:
1442 case 41476:
1443 case 41479:
1444 case 44290:
1445 case 55964:
1446 case 71400:
1447 {
1448 for (const auto& iter : m_target->getInRangeObjectsSet())
1449 {
1450 if (iter == nullptr || !iter->isCreatureOrPlayer())
1451 continue;
1452
1453 Unit* _unit = static_cast<Unit*>(iter);
1454 if (!_unit->isAlive())
1455 continue;
1456
1457 if (_unit->isCastingSpell())
1458 {
1459 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < CURRENT_SPELL_MAX; ++i)
1460 {
1461 Spell* curSpell = _unit->getCurrentSpell(CurrentSpellType(i));
1462 if (curSpell != nullptr && curSpell->getUnitTarget() == m_target)
1463 {
1464 _unit->interruptSpellWithSpellType(CurrentSpellType(i));
1465 }
1466 }
1467 }
1468 if(_unit->getThreatManager().canHaveThreatList())
1469 _unit->getThreatManager().clearThreat(m_target);
1470
1471 }
1472
1473 m_target->getCombatHandler().clearCombat();
1474
1475 SpellMechanic mechanicList[] =
1476 {
1477 MECHANIC_ROOTED,
1478 MECHANIC_ENSNARED,
1479 MECHANIC_NONE,
1480 };
1481 m_target->removeAllAurasBySpellMechanic(mechanicList, true);
1482
1483 // Cast stealth spell/dismount/drop BG flag
1484 if (p_target != nullptr)
1485 {
1486 p_target->castSpell(p_target, 1784, true);
1487
1488 p_target->dismount();
1489
1490 if (p_target->getBattleground() && p_target->hasBgFlag())
1491 {
1492 if (p_target->getBattleground()->getType() == BattlegroundDef::TYPE_WARSONG_GULCH || p_target->getBattleground()->getType() == BattlegroundDef::TYPE_EYE_OF_THE_STORM)
1493 {
1494 p_target->getBattleground()->HookOnFlagDrop(p_target);
1495 }
1496 }
1497 }
1498 } break;
1499 }
1500 }
1501 }
1502 else
1503 {
1504 m_target->modStealthLevel(StealthFlag(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()), -aurEff->getEffectDamage());
1505
1506 switch (m_spellInfo->getId())
1507 {
1508 //SPELL_HASH_VANISH
1509 case 1856:
1510 case 1857:
1511 case 11327:
1512 case 11329:
1513 case 24223:
1514 case 24228:
1515 case 24229:
1516 case 24230:
1517 case 24231:
1518 case 24232:
1519 case 24233:
1520 case 24699:
1521 case 26888:
1522 case 26889:
1523 case 27617:
1524 case 29448:
1525 case 31619:
1526 case 35205:
1527 case 39667:
1528 case 41476:
1529 case 41479:
1530 case 44290:
1531 case 55964:
1532 case 71400:
1533 break;
1534 default:
1535 {
1536 m_target->removeStandStateFlags(UNIT_STAND_FLAGS_CREEP);
1537
1538 if (p_target != nullptr)
1539 {
1540#if VERSION_STRING != Mop
1541 p_target->removeAuraVision(AURA_VISION_STEALTH);
1542#endif
1543 p_target->sendSpellCooldownEventPacket(m_spellInfo->getId());
1544
1545 if (p_target->m_outStealthDamageBonusPeriod && p_target->m_outStealthDamageBonusPct)
1546 p_target->m_outStealthDamageBonusTimer = (uint32_t)UNIXTIME + p_target->m_outStealthDamageBonusPeriod;
1547 }
1548 } break;
1549 }
1550
1551 switch (m_spellInfo->getId())
1552 {
1553 //SPELL_HASH_STEALTH
1554 case 1784:
1555 case 1785:
1556 case 1786:
1557 case 1787:
1558 case 8822:
1559 case 30831:
1560 case 30991:
1561 case 31526:
1562 case 31621:
1563 case 32199:
1564 case 32615:
1565 case 34189:
1566 case 42347:
1567 case 42866:
1568 case 42943:
1569 case 52188:
1570 case 58506:
1571 {
1572 for (uint16_t x = AuraSlots::POSITIVE_SLOT_START; x < AuraSlots::POSITIVE_SLOT_END; ++x)
1573 {
1574 auto* const aur = m_target->getAuraWithAuraSlot(x);
1575 if (aur == nullptr)
1576 continue;
1577
1578 if (aur->getSpellInfo()->getEffectApplyAuraName(0) != SPELL_AURA_DUMMY)
1579 {
1580 uint32_t tmp_duration = 0;
1581
1582 switch (aur->getSpellInfo()->getId())
1583 {
1584 //SPELL_HASH_MASTER_OF_SUBTLETY
1585 case 31221:
1586 case 31222:
1587 case 31223:
1588 case 31665:
1589 case 31666:
1590 {
1591 tmp_duration = TimeVarsMs::Second * 6;
1592 } break;
1593
1594 //SPELL_HASH_OVERKILL
1595 case 58426:
1596 case 58427:
1597 {
1598 tmp_duration = TimeVarsMs::Second * 20;
1599 } break;
1600 }
1601
1602 if (tmp_duration != 0)
1603 {
1604 aur->setTimeLeft(tmp_duration);
1605 aur->refreshOrModifyStack();
1606
1607 sEventMgr.ModifyEventTimeLeft(aur, EVENT_AURA_REMOVE, tmp_duration);
1608 sEventMgr.AddEvent(aur, &Aura::removeAura, AURA_REMOVE_ON_EXPIRE, EVENT_AURA_REMOVE, tmp_duration, 1, EVENT_FLAG_DO_NOT_EXECUTE_IN_WORLD_CONTEXT | EVENT_FLAG_DELETES_OBJECT);
1609 }
1610 }
1611 }
1612 } break;
1613 }
1614 }
1615
1616 m_target->updateVisibility();
1617}
1618
1619void Aura::SpellAuraModStealthDetection(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
1620{
1621 if (apply)
1622 m_target->modStealthDetection(StealthFlag(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()), aurEff->getEffectDamage());
1623 else
1624 m_target->modStealthDetection(StealthFlag(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()), -aurEff->getEffectDamage());
1625}
1626
1627void Aura::SpellAuraModInvisibility(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
1628{
1629 mPositive = true;
1630 if (m_spellInfo->getEffect(aurEff->getEffectIndex()) == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_FRIEND_AREA_AURA) ///\todo WTF is this crap? TODO clean this
1631 return;
1632
1633 if (apply)
1634 {
1635 m_target->modInvisibilityLevel(InvisibilityFlag(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()), aurEff->getEffectDamage());
1636 if (m_target->isPlayer())
1637 {
1638#if VERSION_STRING != Mop
1639 if (getSpellId() == 32612)
1640 if (const auto player = dynamic_cast<Player*>(m_target))
1641 player->addAuraVision(AURA_VISION_INVISIBILITY); //Mage Invis self visual
1642#endif
1643 }
1644
1645 m_target->removeAllAurasByAuraInterruptFlag(AURA_INTERRUPT_ON_INVINCIBLE);
1646 }
1647 else
1648 {
1649 m_target->modInvisibilityLevel(InvisibilityFlag(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()), -aurEff->getEffectDamage());
1650 if (m_target->isPlayer())
1651 {
1652#if VERSION_STRING != Mop
1653 if (getSpellId() == 32612)
1654 if (const auto player = dynamic_cast<Player*>(m_target))
1655 player->removeAuraVision(AURA_VISION_INVISIBILITY);
1656#endif
1657 }
1658 }
1659
1660 m_target->updateVisibility();
1661}
1662
1663void Aura::SpellAuraModInvisibilityDetection(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
1664{
1665 //Always Positive
1666
1667 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() < INVIS_FLAG_TOTAL)
1668 {
1669 if (apply)
1670 {
1671 m_target->modInvisibilityDetection(InvisibilityFlag(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()), aurEff->getEffectDamage());
1672 mPositive = true;
1673 }
1674 else
1675 m_target->modInvisibilityDetection(InvisibilityFlag(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()), -aurEff->getEffectDamage());
1676
1677 if (m_target->isPlayer())
1678 m_target->updateVisibility();
1679 }
1680}
1681
1682void Aura::SpellAuraModResistance(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
1683{
1684 uint32_t Flag = aurEff->getEffectMiscValue();
1685 int32_t amt;
1686 if (apply)
1687 {
1688 amt = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
1689 if (amt < 0)//don't change it
1690 mPositive = false;
1691 else
1692 mPositive = true;
1693 }
1694 else
1695 amt = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
1696 Unit* caster = GetUnitCaster();
1697 if (isNegative() && caster != nullptr && m_target->isCreature())
1698 m_target->getAIInterface()->onHostileAction(caster);
1699
1700 Player* plr = GetPlayerCaster();
1701 if (plr != nullptr)
1702 {
1703 switch (getSpellInfo()->getId())
1704 {
1705 //SPELL_HASH_DEVOTION_AURA
1706 case 465:
1707 case 643:
1708 case 1032:
1709 case 8258:
1710 case 10290:
1711 case 10291:
1712 case 10292:
1713 case 10293:
1714 case 17232:
1715 case 27149:
1716 case 41452:
1717 case 48941:
1718 case 48942:
1719 case 52442:
1720 case 57740:
1721 case 58944:
1722 {
1723 // Increases the armor bonus of your Devotion Aura by %u - HACKY
1724 if (plr->hasSpell(20140)) // Improved Devotion Aura Rank 3
1725 amt = (int32_t)(amt * 1.5);
1726 else if (plr->hasSpell(20139)) // Improved Devotion Aura Rank 2
1727 amt = (int32_t)(amt * 1.34);
1728 else if (plr->hasSpell(20138)) // Improved Devotion Aura Rank 1
1729 amt = (int32_t)(amt * 1.17);
1730 } break;
1731 }
1732 }
1733
1734 if (m_target->isPlayer())
1735 {
1736 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < TOTAL_SPELL_SCHOOLS; x++)
1737 {
1738 if (Flag & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
1739 {
1740 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0)
1741 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_flatResistanceModifierPos[x] += amt;
1742 else
1743 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_flatResistanceModifierNeg[x] -= amt;
1744 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->calcResistance(x);
1745 }
1746 }
1747 }
1748 else if (m_target->isCreature())
1749 {
1750 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < TOTAL_SPELL_SCHOOLS; x++)
1751 {
1752 if (Flag & (((uint32_t)1) << (uint32_t)x))
1753 {
1754 static_cast< Creature* >(m_target)->FlatResistanceMod[x] += amt;
1755 static_cast< Creature* >(m_target)->CalcResistance(x);
1756 }
1757 }
1758 }
1759}
1760
1761void Aura::SpellAuraModPacify(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
1762{
1763 // Can't Attack
1764 if (apply)
1765 {
1766 if (m_spellInfo->getId() == 24937 || m_spellInfo->getId() == 41450) //SPELL_HASH_BLESSING_OF_PROTECTION
1767 mPositive = true;
1768 else
1769 mPositive = false;
1770
1771 m_target->m_pacified++;
1772 m_target->addUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED);
1773 }
1774 else
1775 {
1776 m_target->m_pacified--;
1777
1778 if (m_target->m_pacified == 0)
1779 {
1780 m_target->removeUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED);
1781 }
1782 }
1783}
1784
1785void Aura::SpellAuraModRoot(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
1786{
1787 if (apply)
1788 {
1789 // Check Mechanic Immunity
1790 if (m_target->m_mechanicsDispels[MECHANIC_ROOTED])
1791 {
1792 m_flags |= 1 << aurEff->getEffectIndex();
1793 return;
1794 }
1795
1796 mPositive = false;
1797
1798 //\todo Zyres: is tis relly the way this should work?
1799 m_target->m_rootCounter++;
1800
1801 if (m_target->m_rootCounter == 1)
1802 m_target->setControlled(true, UNIT_STATE_ROOTED);
1803
1804 //warrior talent - second wind triggers on stun and immobilize. This is not used as proc to be triggered always !
1805 Unit* caster = GetUnitCaster();
1806 if (caster != nullptr)
1807 {
1808 caster->eventStunOrImmobilize(m_target);
1809 m_target->eventStunOrImmobilize(caster, true);
1810 }
1811
1812 if (getSpellInfo()->getSchoolMask() & SCHOOL_MASK_FROST && !m_target->m_ascFrozen++)
1813 m_target->addAuraStateAndAuras(AURASTATE_FLAG_FROZEN);
1814
1815 ///\todo -Supalosa- TODO: Mobs will attack nearest enemy in range on aggro list when rooted. */
1816 }
1817 else if ((m_flags & (1 << aurEff->getEffectIndex())) == 0) //add these checks to mods where immunity can cancel only 1 mod and not whole spell
1818 {
1819 //\todo Zyres: is tis relly the way this should work?
1820 m_target->m_rootCounter--;
1821
1822 if (m_target->m_rootCounter == 0)
1823 m_target->setControlled(false, UNIT_STATE_ROOTED);
1824
1825 if (m_target->isCreature())
1826 m_target->getAIInterface()->onHostileAction(GetUnitCaster());
1827
1828 if (getSpellInfo()->getSchoolMask() & SCHOOL_MASK_FROST && !--m_target->m_ascFrozen)
1829 m_target->removeAuraStateAndAuras(AURASTATE_FLAG_FROZEN);
1830 }
1831}
1832
1833void Aura::SpellAuraModSilence(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
1834{
1835 if (apply)
1836 {
1837 m_target->m_silenced++;
1838 m_target->addUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED);
1839
1840 // Interrupt target's current casted spell (either channeled or generic spell with cast time)
1841 if (m_target->isCastingSpell(false, true))
1842 {
1843 if (m_target->getCurrentSpell(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL) != nullptr && m_target->getCurrentSpell(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL)->getCastTimeLeft() > 0)
1844 {
1845 m_target->interruptSpellWithSpellType(CURRENT_CHANNELED_SPELL);
1846 }
1847 // No need to check cast time for generic spells, checked already in Object::isCastingSpell()
1848 else if (m_target->getCurrentSpell(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL) != nullptr)
1849 {
1850 m_target->interruptSpellWithSpellType(CURRENT_GENERIC_SPELL);
1851 }
1852 }
1853 }
1854 else
1855 {
1856 m_target->m_silenced--;
1857
1858 if (m_target->m_silenced == 0)
1859 {
1860 m_target->removeUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED);
1861 }
1862 }
1863}
1864
1865void Aura::SpellAuraReflectSpells(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
1866{
1867 m_target->removeReflect(getSpellId(), apply);
1868
1869 if (apply)
1870 {
1871 m_target->m_reflectSpellSchool.emplace_back(std::make_unique<ReflectSpellSchool>(getSpellId(), m_spellInfo->getProcCharges(), -1, aurEff->getEffectDamage(), false));
1872 }
1873}
1874
1875void Aura::SpellAuraModStat(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
1876{
1877#if VERSION_STRING > TBC // support classic
1878 int32_t stat = aurEff->getEffectMiscValue();
1879 int32_t val;
1880
1881 if (apply)
1882 {
1883 val = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
1884 if (val < 0)
1885 mPositive = false;
1886 else
1887 mPositive = true;
1888 }
1889 else
1890 {
1891 val = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
1892 }
1893
1894 if (stat == -1) //all stats
1895 {
1896 if (m_target->isPlayer())
1897 {
1898 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < 5; x++)
1899 {
1900 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0)
1901 dynamic_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_flatStatModPos[x] += val;
1902 else
1903 dynamic_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_flatStatModNeg[x] -= val;
1904
1905 dynamic_cast< Player* >(m_target)->calcStat(x);
1906 }
1907
1908 dynamic_cast< Player* >(m_target)->updateStats();
1909 dynamic_cast< Player* >(m_target)->updateChances();
1910 }
1911 else if (m_target->isCreature())
1912 {
1913 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < 5; x++)
1914 {
1915 dynamic_cast< Creature* >(m_target)->FlatStatMod[x] += val;
1916 dynamic_cast< Creature* >(m_target)->CalcStat(x);
1917 }
1918 }
1919 }
1920 else if (stat >= 0)
1921 {
1922 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() < 5)
1923 {
1924 uint8_t modValue = static_cast<uint8_t>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue());
1925 if (m_target->isPlayer())
1926 {
1927 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0)
1928 dynamic_cast<Player*>(m_target)->m_flatStatModPos[modValue] += val;
1929 else
1930 dynamic_cast<Player*>(m_target)->m_flatStatModNeg[modValue] -= val;
1931
1932 dynamic_cast<Player*>(m_target)->calcStat(modValue);
1933
1934 dynamic_cast<Player*>(m_target)->updateStats();
1935 dynamic_cast<Player*>(m_target)->updateChances();
1936 }
1937 else if (m_target->isCreature())
1938 {
1939 dynamic_cast<Creature*>(m_target)->FlatStatMod[modValue] += val;
1940 dynamic_cast<Creature*>(m_target)->CalcStat(modValue);
1941 }
1942 }
1943 }
1944#endif
1945}
1946
1947void Aura::SpellAuraModSkill(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
1948{
1949 if (m_target->isPlayer())
1950 {
1951 const auto skillLine = static_cast<uint16_t>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue());
1952 const auto amount = static_cast<int16_t>(aurEff->getEffectDamage());
1953 if (apply)
1954 {
1955 if (!p_target->hasSkillLine(skillLine))
1956 {
1957 aurEff->setEffectActive(false);
1958 return;
1959 }
1960
1961 mPositive = true;
1962 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(skillLine, amount, false);
1963 }
1964 else
1965 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(skillLine, -amount, false);
1966
1967 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->updateStats();
1968 }
1969}
1970
1971void Aura::SpellAuraModIncreaseSpeed(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
1972{
1973 if (apply)
1974 m_target->m_speedModifier += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
1975 else
1976 m_target->m_speedModifier -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
1977
1978 m_target->updateSpeed();
1979}
1980
1981void Aura::SpellAuraModIncreaseMountedSpeed(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
1982{
1983 if ((getSpellId() == 68768 || getSpellId() == 68769) && p_target != nullptr)
1984 {
1985 int32_t newspeed = 0;
1986
1987 if (p_target->getSkillLineCurrent(SKILL_RIDING, true) >= 150)
1988 newspeed = 100;
1989 else if (p_target->getSkillLineCurrent(SKILL_RIDING, true) >= 75)
1990 newspeed = 60;
1991
1992 aurEff->setEffectDamage(newspeed); // EffectBasePoints + 1 (59+1 and 99+1)
1993 }
1994
1995 if (apply)
1996 {
1997 mPositive = true;
1998 m_target->m_mountedspeedModifier += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
1999 }
2000 else
2001 m_target->m_mountedspeedModifier -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2002 m_target->updateSpeed();
2003}
2004
2005void Aura::SpellAuraModCreatureRangedAttackPower(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2006{
2007 if (apply)
2008 {
2009 for (uint32_t x = 0; x < 11; x++)
2010 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
2011 m_target->m_creatureRangedAttackPowerMod[x + 1] += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2012 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() < 0)
2013 mPositive = false;
2014 else
2015 mPositive = true;
2016 }
2017 else
2018 {
2019 for (uint32_t x = 0; x < 11; x++)
2020 {
2021 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
2022 {
2023 m_target->m_creatureRangedAttackPowerMod[x + 1] -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2024 }
2025 }
2026 }
2027 m_target->calculateDamage();
2028}
2029
2030void Aura::SpellAuraModDecreaseSpeed(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2031{
2032 //there can not be 2 slow downs only most powerful is applied
2033 if (apply)
2034 {
2035 // Check Mechanic Immunity
2036 if (m_target->m_mechanicsDispels[MECHANIC_ENSNARED])
2037 {
2038 m_flags |= 1 << aurEff->getEffectIndex();
2039 return;
2040 }
2041 switch (m_spellInfo->getId())
2042 {
2043 // SPELL_HASH_STEALTH
2044 case 1784:
2045 case 1785:
2046 case 1786:
2047 case 1787:
2048 case 8822:
2049 case 30831:
2050 case 30991:
2051 case 31526:
2052 case 31621:
2053 case 32199:
2054 case 32615:
2055 case 34189:
2056 case 42347:
2057 case 42866:
2058 case 42943:
2059 case 52188:
2060 case 58506:
2061 mPositive = true;
2062 break;
2063
2064 // SPELL_HASH_DAZED
2065 case 1604:
2066 case 5101:
2067 case 13496:
2068 case 15571:
2069 case 29703:
2070 case 35955:
2071 case 50259:
2072 case 50411:
2073 case 51372:
2074 mPositive = false;
2075 break;
2076
2077 default:
2078 /* burlex: this would be better as a if (caster is hostile to target) then effect = negative) */
2079 if (m_casterGuid != m_target->getGuid())
2080 mPositive = false;
2081 break;
2082 }
2083
2084 //let's check Mage talents if we proc anything
2085 if (m_spellInfo->getSchoolMask() & SCHOOL_MASK_FROST)
2086 {
2087 //yes we are freezing the bastard, so can we proc anything on this ?
2088 Unit* caster = GetUnitCaster();
2089 if (caster != nullptr && caster->isPlayer())
2090 caster->eventChill(m_target);
2091 if (m_target->isPlayer() && caster)
2092 m_target->eventChill(caster, true);
2093 }
2094 m_target->speedReductionMap.insert(std::make_pair(m_spellInfo->getId(), aurEff->getEffectDamage()));
2095 //m_target->m_slowdown=this;
2096 //m_target->m_speedModifier += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2097 }
2098 else if ((m_flags & (1 << aurEff->getEffectIndex())) == 0) //add these checks to mods where immunity can cancel only 1 mod and not whole spell
2099 {
2100 std::map< uint32_t, int32_t >::iterator itr = m_target->speedReductionMap.find(m_spellInfo->getId());
2101 if (itr != m_target->speedReductionMap.end())
2102 m_target->speedReductionMap.erase(itr);
2103 //m_target->m_speedModifier -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2104 //m_target->m_slowdown= NULL;
2105 }
2106 if (m_target->getSpeedDecrease())
2107 m_target->updateSpeed();
2108}
2109
2110void Aura::UpdateAuraModDecreaseSpeed(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff)
2111{
2112 if (m_target->m_mechanicsDispels[MECHANIC_ENSNARED])
2113 {
2114 m_flags |= 1 << aurEff->getEffectIndex();
2115 return;
2116 }
2117
2118 //let's check Mage talents if we proc anything
2119 if (m_spellInfo->getSchoolMask() & SCHOOL_MASK_FROST)
2120 {
2121 //yes we are freezing the bastard, so can we proc anything on this ?
2122 Unit* caster = GetUnitCaster();
2123 if (caster && caster->isPlayer())
2124 caster->eventChill(m_target);
2125 if (m_target->isPlayer() && caster)
2126 m_target->eventChill(caster, true);
2127 }
2128}
2129
2130void Aura::SpellAuraModIncreaseHealth(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2131{
2132 int32_t amt;
2133
2134 if (apply)
2135 {
2136 //threat special cases. We should move these to scripted spells maybe
2137 switch (m_spellInfo->getId())
2138 {
2139 case 23782:// Gift of Life
2140 aurEff->setEffectDamage(1500);
2141 break;
2142 case 12976:// Last Stand
2143 aurEff->setEffectDamage((int32_t)(m_target->getMaxHealth() * 0.3));
2144 break;
2145 }
2146 mPositive = true;
2147 amt = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2148 }
2149 else
2150 amt = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2151
2152 if (m_target->isPlayer())
2153 {
2154 //maybe we should not adjust hitpoints too but only maximum health
2155 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->setHealthFromSpell(static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->getHealthFromSpell() + amt);
2156 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->updateStats();
2157 if (apply)
2158 m_target->modHealth(amt);
2159 else
2160 {
2161 if ((int32_t)m_target->getHealth() > -amt) //watch it on remove value is negative
2162 m_target->modHealth(amt);
2163 else m_target->setHealth(1); //do not kill player but do strip him good
2164 }
2165 }
2166 else
2167 m_target->modMaxHealth(amt);
2168}
2169
2170void Aura::SpellAuraModIncreaseEnergy(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2171{
2172 mPositive = true;
2173 //uint32_t powerField,maxField ;
2174 //uint8_t powerType = m_target->GetPowerType();
2175
2176 /*if (powerType == POWER_TYPE_MANA) // Mana
2177 {
2178 powerField = UNIT_FIELD_POWER1;
2179 maxField = UNIT_FIELD_MAXPOWER1;
2180 }
2181 else if (powerType == POWER_TYPE_RAGE) // Rage
2182 {
2183 powerField = UNIT_FIELD_POWER2;
2184 maxField = UNIT_FIELD_MAXPOWER2;
2185 }
2186 else if (powerType == POWER_TYPE_ENERGY) // Energy
2187 {
2188 powerField = UNIT_FIELD_POWER4;
2189 maxField = UNIT_FIELD_MAXPOWER4;
2190 }
2191 else // Capt: if we can not use identify the type: do nothing
2192 return; */
2193
2194 int32_t amount = apply ? aurEff->getEffectDamage() : -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2195 auto modValue = static_cast<PowerType>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue());
2196 m_target->modMaxPower(modValue, amount);
2197 m_target->modPower(modValue, amount);
2198
2199 if (modValue == 0 && m_target->isPlayer())
2200 {
2201 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->setManaFromSpell(static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->getManaFromSpell() + amount);
2202 }
2203}
2204
2205void Aura::SpellAuraModEffectImmunity(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
2206{
2207 if (m_spellInfo->getId() == 24937)
2208 mPositive = true;
2209
2210 if (!apply)
2211 {
2212 if (m_spellInfo->getId() == 23333 || m_spellInfo->getId() == 23335 || m_spellInfo->getId() == 34976)
2213 {
2214 Player* plr = GetPlayerCaster();
2215 if (plr == nullptr || plr->getBattleground() == nullptr)
2216 return;
2217
2218 plr->getBattleground()->HookOnFlagDrop(plr);
2219
2220 }
2221 }
2222}
2223
2224void Aura::SpellAuraModStateImmunity(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool /*apply*/)
2225{
2226 //%50 chance to dispel 1 magic effect on target
2227 //23922
2228}
2229
2230void Aura::SpellAuraModSchoolImmunity(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2231{
2232 switch (m_spellInfo->getId())
2233 {
2234 //SPELL_HASH_DIVINE_SHIELD
2235 case 642:
2236 case 13874:
2237 case 29382:
2238 case 33581:
2239 case 40733:
2240 case 41367:
2241 case 54322:
2242 case 63148:
2243 case 66010:
2244 case 67251:
2245 case 71550:
2246 //SPELL_HASH_ICE_BLOCK
2247 case 27619:
2248 case 36911:
2249 case 41590:
2250 case 45438:
2251 case 45776:
2252 case 46604:
2253 case 46882:
2254 case 56124:
2255 case 56644:
2256 case 62766:
2257 case 65802:
2258 case 69924:
2259 {
2260 if (apply)
2261 {
2262 if (!m_target->isAlive())
2263 return;
2264
2265 for (uint16_t i = AuraSlots::NEGATIVE_SLOT_START; i < AuraSlots::NEGATIVE_SLOT_END; ++i)
2266 {
2267 auto* const pAura = m_target->getAuraWithAuraSlot(i);
2268 if (pAura != this &&
2269 pAura != nullptr &&
2270 !pAura->IsPassive() &&
2271 pAura->isNegative() &&
2272 !(pAura->getSpellInfo()->getAttributes() & ATTRIBUTES_IGNORE_INVULNERABILITY))
2273 {
2274 pAura->removeAura();
2275 }
2276 }
2277 }
2278 } break;
2279 }
2280
2281 switch (m_spellInfo->getId())
2282 {
2283 //SPELL_HASH_DIVINE_SHIELD
2284 case 642:
2285 case 13874:
2286 case 29382:
2287 case 33581:
2288 case 40733:
2289 case 41367:
2290 case 54322:
2291 case 63148:
2292 case 66010:
2293 case 67251:
2294 case 71550:
2295 //SPELL_HASH_BLESSING_OF_PROTECTION
2296 case 41450:
2297 //SPELL_HASH_ICE_BLOCK
2298 case 27619:
2299 case 36911:
2300 case 41590:
2301 case 45438:
2302 case 45776:
2303 case 46604:
2304 case 46882:
2305 case 56124:
2306 case 56644:
2307 case 62766:
2308 case 65802:
2309 case 69924:
2310 {
2311 if (apply)
2312 m_target->removeAllAurasByAuraInterruptFlag(AURA_INTERRUPT_ON_INVINCIBLE);
2313 } break;
2314 }
2315
2316 if (apply)
2317 {
2318 //fix me may be negative
2319 Unit* c = GetUnitCaster();
2320 if (c)
2321 {
2322 if (c->isValidTarget(m_target))
2323 mPositive = false;
2324 else mPositive = true;
2325 }
2326 else
2327 mPositive = true;
2328
2329 sLogger.debug("SpellAuraModSchoolImmunity called with misValue = {:x}", aurEff->getEffectMiscValue());
2330 m_target->removeAllAurasBySchoolMask(static_cast<SchoolMask>(getSpellInfo()->getSchoolMask()), true, true);
2331 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < TOTAL_SPELL_SCHOOLS; i++)
2332 {
2333 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (1 << i))
2334 {
2335 m_target->m_schoolImmunityList[i]++;
2336 }
2337 }
2338 m_target->getThreatManager().evaluateSuppressed();
2339 }
2340 else
2341 {
2342 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < TOTAL_SPELL_SCHOOLS; i++)
2343 {
2344 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (1 << i) &&
2345 m_target->m_schoolImmunityList[i] > 0)
2346 {
2347 m_target->m_schoolImmunityList[i]--;
2348 }
2349 }
2350 }
2351}
2352
2353void Aura::SpellAuraModDmgImmunity(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
2354{
2355 if (apply)
2356 m_target->getThreatManager().evaluateSuppressed();
2357}
2358
2359void Aura::SpellAuraModDispelImmunity(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2360{
2361 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() < 10)
2362 {
2363 if (apply)
2364 m_target->m_dispels[aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()]++;
2365 else
2366 m_target->m_dispels[aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()]--;
2367
2368 if (apply)
2369 {
2370 for (uint16_t x = AuraSlots::POSITIVE_SLOT_START; x < AuraSlots::POSITIVE_SLOT_END; ++x)
2371 {
2372 auto* const aur = m_target->getAuraWithAuraSlot(x);
2373 // HACK FIX FOR: 41425 and 25771
2374 if (aur && aur->getSpellId() != 41425 && aur->getSpellId() != 25771)
2375 if (aur->getSpellInfo()->getDispelType() == (uint32_t)aurEff->getEffectMiscValue())
2376 aur->removeAura();
2377 }
2378 }
2379 }
2380}
2381
2382void Aura::SpellAuraProcTriggerSpell(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2383{
2384 if (apply)
2385 {
2386 uint32_t spellId;
2387
2388 // Find spell of effect to be triggered
2389 spellId = getSpellInfo()->getEffectTriggerSpell(aurEff->getEffectIndex());
2390 if (spellId == 0)
2391 {
2392 sLogger.debug("Warning! trigger spell is null for spell {}", getSpellInfo()->getId());
2393 return;
2394 }
2395
2396 // Initialize proc mask
2397 // TODO: investigate why blizzard is using random spells in the proc mask
2398 // for example: druid talent earth and moon should proc from Wrath and Starfire
2399 // however dbc proc mask has Moonfire and Starfall
2400 // another example: warrior talent juggernaut should proc from Charge
2401 // dbc proc mask has Slam
2402
2403 //groupRelation[0] = getSpellInfo()->getEffectSpellClassMask(aurEff->getEffectIndex(), 0);
2404 //groupRelation[1] = getSpellInfo()->getEffectSpellClassMask(aurEff->getEffectIndex(), 1);
2405 //groupRelation[2] = getSpellInfo()->getEffectSpellClassMask(aurEff->getEffectIndex(), 2);
2406
2407 m_target->addProcTriggerSpell(spellId, getSpellInfo()->getId(), m_casterGuid, getSpellInfo()->getProcChance(), SpellProcFlags(getSpellInfo()->getProcFlags()), EXTRA_PROC_NULL, nullptr, nullptr, this);
2408
2409 sLogger.debug("{} is registering {} chance {} flags {} charges {}", getSpellInfo()->getId(), spellId, getSpellInfo()->getProcChance(), getSpellInfo()->getProcFlags(), getCharges());
2410 }
2411 else
2412 {
2413 // Find spell of effect to be triggered
2414 uint32_t spellId = getSpellInfo()->getEffectTriggerSpell(aurEff->getEffectIndex());
2415 if (spellId == 0)
2416 {
2417 sLogger.debug("Warning! trigger spell is null for spell {}", getSpellInfo()->getId());
2418 return;
2419 }
2420
2421 m_target->removeProcTriggerSpell(spellId, m_casterGuid);
2422 }
2423}
2424
2425void Aura::SpellAuraProcTriggerDamage(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2426{
2427 if (apply)
2428 {
2429 DamageProc ds;
2430 ds.m_damage = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2431 ds.m_spellId = getSpellInfo()->getId();
2432 ds.m_school = getSpellInfo()->getFirstSchoolFromSchoolMask();
2433 ds.m_flags = m_spellInfo->getProcFlags();
2434 ds.owner = (void*)this;
2435 m_target->m_damageShields.push_back(ds);
2436 sLogger.debug("registering dmg proc {}, school {}, flags {}, charges at least {}", ds.m_spellId, ds.m_school, ds.m_flags, m_spellInfo->getProcCharges());
2437 }
2438 else
2439 {
2440 for (std::list<struct DamageProc>::iterator i = m_target->m_damageShields.begin(); i != m_target->m_damageShields.end(); ++i)
2441 {
2442 if (i->owner == this)
2443 {
2444 m_target->m_damageShields.erase(i);
2445 break;
2446 }
2447 }
2448 }
2449}
2450
2451void Aura::SpellAuraTrackCreatures(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2452{
2453 if (p_target != nullptr)
2454 {
2455 if (apply)
2456 {
2457 if (p_target->m_trackingSpell != 0)
2458 p_target->removeAllAurasById(p_target->m_trackingSpell);
2459
2460 p_target->setTrackCreature((uint32_t)1 << (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() - 1));
2461 p_target->m_trackingSpell = getSpellId();
2462 }
2463 else
2464 {
2465 p_target->m_trackingSpell = 0;
2466 p_target->setTrackCreature(0);
2467 }
2468 }
2469}
2470
2471void Aura::SpellAuraTrackResources(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2472{
2473 if (p_target != nullptr)
2474 {
2475 if (apply)
2476 {
2477 if (p_target->m_trackingSpell != 0)
2478 p_target->removeAllAurasById(p_target->m_trackingSpell);
2479
2480 p_target->setTrackResource((uint32_t)1 << (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() - 1));
2481 p_target->m_trackingSpell = getSpellId();
2482 }
2483 else
2484 {
2485 p_target->m_trackingSpell = 0;
2486 p_target->setTrackResource(0);
2487 }
2488 }
2489}
2490
2491void Aura::SpellAuraModParryPerc(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2492{
2493#if VERSION_STRING > TBC // support classic
2494 //if (m_target->getObjectTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2495 {
2496 int32_t amt;
2497 if (apply)
2498 {
2499 amt = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2500 if (amt < 0)
2501 mPositive = false;
2502 else
2503 mPositive = true;
2504
2505 }
2506 else
2507 amt = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2508
2509 m_target->setParryFromSpell(m_target->getParryFromSpell() + amt);
2510 if (p_target != nullptr)
2511 {
2512 p_target->updateChances();
2513 }
2514 }
2515#endif
2516}
2517
2518void Aura::SpellAuraModDodgePerc(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2519{
2520#if VERSION_STRING > TBC // support classic
2521 // if (m_target->getObjectTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2522 {
2523 int32_t amt = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2524 // spellModFlatIntValue(m_target->SM_FSPELL_VALUE, &amt, GetSpellProto()->SpellGroupType);
2525 if (apply)
2526 {
2527 if (amt < 0)
2528 mPositive = false;
2529 else
2530 mPositive = true;
2531 }
2532 else
2533 amt = -amt;
2534
2535 m_target->setDodgeFromSpell(m_target->getDodgeFromSpell() + amt);
2536 if (p_target != nullptr)
2537 {
2538 p_target->updateChances();
2539 }
2540 }
2541#endif
2542}
2543
2544void Aura::SpellAuraModBlockPerc(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2545{
2546 //if (m_target->getObjectTypeId() == TYPEID_PLAYER)
2547 {
2548 int32_t amt;
2549 if (apply)
2550 {
2551 amt = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2552 if (amt < 0)
2553 mPositive = false;
2554 else
2555 mPositive = true;
2556 }
2557 else
2558 amt = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2559
2560 m_target->setBlockFromSpell(m_target->getBlockFromSpell() + amt);
2561 if (p_target != nullptr)
2562 {
2563 p_target->updateStats();
2564 }
2565 }
2566}
2567
2568void Aura::SpellAuraModCritPerc(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2569{
2570#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC // support classic
2571 if (p_target != nullptr)
2572 {
2573 if (apply)
2574 {
2575 WeaponModifier md;
2576 md.value = float(aurEff->getEffectDamage());
2577 md.wclass = getSpellInfo()->getEquippedItemClass();
2578 md.subclass = getSpellInfo()->getEquippedItemSubClass();
2579 p_target->m_toCritChance.insert(std::make_pair(getSpellId(), md));
2580 }
2581 else
2582 {
2583 /*std::list<WeaponModifier>::iterator i = TO< Player* >(m_target)->tocritchance.begin();
2584
2585 for (;i!=TO< Player* >(m_target)->tocritchance.end();i++)
2586 {
2587 if ((*i).spellid==getSpellId())
2588 {
2589 TO< Player* >(m_target)->tocritchance.erase(i);
2590 break;
2591 }
2592 }*/
2593 p_target->m_toCritChance.erase(getSpellId());
2594 }
2595 p_target->updateChances();
2596 }
2597#endif
2598}
2599
2600void Aura::SpellAuraModHitChance(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2601{
2602 if (!m_target->isCreatureOrPlayer()) return;
2603
2604 int32_t val = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2605
2606 if (apply)
2607 {
2608 m_target->setHitFromMeleeSpell(m_target->getHitFromMeleeSpell() + val);
2609 if (val < 0)
2610 mPositive = false;
2611 else
2612 mPositive = true;
2613 }
2614 else
2615 {
2616 m_target->setHitFromMeleeSpell(m_target->getHitFromMeleeSpell() - val);
2617 if (m_target->getHitFromMeleeSpell() < 0)
2618 {
2619 m_target->setHitFromMeleeSpell(0);
2620 }
2621 }
2622}
2623
2624void Aura::SpellAuraModSpellHitChance(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2625{
2626 if (p_target != nullptr)
2627 {
2628 if (apply)
2629 {
2630 p_target->setHitFromSpell(p_target->getHitFromSpell() + aurEff->getEffectDamage());
2631 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() < 0)
2632 mPositive = false;
2633 else
2634 mPositive = true;
2635 }
2636 else
2637 {
2638 p_target->setHitFromSpell(p_target->getHitFromSpell() - aurEff->getEffectDamage());
2639 if (p_target->getHitFromSpell() < 0)
2640 {
2641 p_target->setHitFromSpell(0);
2642 }
2643 }
2644 }
2645}
2646
2647void Aura::SpellAuraModSpellCritChance(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2648{
2649 if (p_target != nullptr)
2650 {
2651 int32_t amt;
2652 if (apply)
2653 {
2654 amt = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2655 if (amt < 0)
2656 mPositive = false;
2657 else
2658 mPositive = true;
2659 }
2660 else
2661 amt = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2662
2663 p_target->m_spellCritPercentage += amt;
2664 p_target->setSpellCritFromSpell(p_target->getSpellCritFromSpell() + amt);
2665 p_target->updateChanceFields();
2666 }
2667}
2668
2669void Aura::SpellAuraIncreaseSwimSpeed(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2670{
2671 if (apply)
2672 {
2673 if (m_target->isAlive())
2674 mPositive = true;
2675
2676 m_target->setSpeedRate(TYPE_SWIM, 0.04722222f * (100 + aurEff->getEffectDamage()), true);
2677 }
2678 else
2679 m_target->setSpeedRate(TYPE_SWIM, m_target->getSpeedRate(TYPE_SWIM, false), false);
2680
2681 if (p_target != nullptr)
2682 {
2683 WorldPacket data(SMSG_FORCE_SWIM_SPEED_CHANGE, 17);
2684 data << p_target->GetNewGUID();
2685 data << (uint32_t)2;
2686 data << m_target->getSpeedRate(TYPE_SWIM, true);
2687 p_target->getSession()->SendPacket(&data);
2688 }
2689}
2690
2691void Aura::SpellAuraModCratureDmgDone(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2692{
2693 if (p_target != nullptr)
2694 {
2695 if (apply)
2696 {
2697 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < 11; x++)
2698 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & ((uint32_t)1 << x))
2699 p_target->m_increaseDamageByType[x + 1] += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2700
2701 aurEff->getEffectDamage() < 0 ? mPositive = false : mPositive = true;
2702 }
2703 else
2704 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < 11; x++)
2705 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
2706 p_target->m_increaseDamageByType[x + 1] -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2707 }
2708}
2709
2710void Aura::SpellAuraPacifySilence(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
2711{
2712 // Can't Attack or Cast Spells
2713 if (apply)
2714 {
2715 if (m_spellInfo->getId() == 24937)
2716 mPositive = true;
2717 else
2718 mPositive = false;
2719
2720 m_target->m_pacified++;
2721 m_target->m_silenced++;
2722 m_target->addUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED | UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED);
2723
2724 if (m_target->isCastingSpell())
2725 {
2726 m_target->interruptSpell();
2727 }
2728 }
2729 else
2730 {
2731 m_target->m_pacified--;
2732
2733 if (m_target->m_pacified == 0)
2734 {
2735 m_target->removeUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_PACIFIED);
2736 }
2737
2738 m_target->m_silenced--;
2739
2740 if (m_target->m_silenced == 0)
2741 {
2742 m_target->removeUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_SILENCED);
2743 }
2744 }
2745}
2746
2747void Aura::SpellAuraModScale(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2748{
2749 float current = m_target->getScale();
2750 float delta = aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100.0f;
2751
2752 m_target->setScale(apply ? (current + current * delta) : current / (1.0f + delta));
2753}
2754
2755void Aura::SpellAuraModCastingSpeed(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2756{
2757 float current = m_target->getModCastSpeed();
2758 if (apply)
2759 current -= aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100.0f;
2760 else
2761 current += aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100.0f;
2762
2763 m_target->setModCastSpeed(current);
2764}
2765
2766bool isFeignDeathResisted(uint32_t playerlevel, uint32_t moblevel)
2767{
2768 int fMobRes = 0;
2769 int diff = 0;
2770
2771 if (playerlevel < moblevel)
2772 {
2773 diff = moblevel - playerlevel;
2774
2775 if (diff <= 2)
2776 fMobRes = diff + 4;
2777 else
2778 fMobRes = (diff - 2) * 11 + 6;
2779
2780 if (fMobRes > 100)
2781 fMobRes = 100;
2782
2783 if (Util::getRandomUInt(1, 100) < static_cast<uint32_t>(fMobRes))
2784 return true;
2785 }
2786
2787 return false;
2788}
2789
2790void Aura::SpellAuraFeignDeath(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
2791{
2792 if (p_target != nullptr)
2793 {
2794 if (apply)
2795 {
2796 p_target->eventAttackStop();
2797 p_target->setDeathState(ALIVE);
2798
2799#if VERSION_STRING != Classic
2800 p_target->addUnitFlags2(UNIT_FLAG2_FEIGN_DEATH);
2801#endif
2802 p_target->addUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_FEIGN_DEATH);
2803 p_target->addDynamicFlags(U_DYN_FLAG_DEAD);
2804
2805 //now get rid of mobs agro. pTarget->m_combatStatusHandler.AttackersForgetHate() - this works only for already attacking mobs
2806 for (const auto& itr : p_target->getInRangeObjectsSet())
2807 {
2808 if (itr && itr->isCreatureOrPlayer() && static_cast<Unit*>(itr)->isAlive())
2809 {
2810 Unit* u = static_cast<Unit*>(itr);
2811 if (isFeignDeathResisted(p_target->getLevel(), u->getLevel()))
2812 {
2813 removeAura();
2814 return;
2815 }
2816 if (u->isCreature())
2817 u->getThreatManager().clearThreat(p_target);
2818
2819 //if this is player and targeting us then we interrupt cast
2820 if (u->isPlayer())
2821 {
2822 Player* plr = static_cast<Player*>(itr);
2823 if (plr->isCastingSpell())
2824 plr->interruptSpell(); // cancel current casting spell
2825 }
2826 }
2827 }
2828
2829 // this looks awkward!
2830 p_target->sendMirrorTimer(MIRROR_TYPE_FIRE, getTimeLeft(), getTimeLeft(), 0xFFFFFFFF);
2831
2832 p_target->removeUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_COMBAT);
2833
2834 /*if (p_target->hasUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_ATTACKING))
2835 p_target->removeUnitStateFlag(UNIT_STATE_ATTACKING);*/
2836
2837 p_target->sendPacket(SmsgCancelCombat().serialise().get());
2838
2839 // Send server-side cancel message
2840 WorldPacket data(SMSG_CANCEL_AUTO_REPEAT, 8);
2841 data << p_target->GetNewGUID();
2842 p_target->sendMessageToSet(&data, false);
2843 }
2844 else
2845 {
2846#if VERSION_STRING != Classic
2847 p_target->removeUnitFlags2(UNIT_FLAG2_FEIGN_DEATH);
2848#endif
2849 p_target->removeUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_FEIGN_DEATH);
2850 p_target->removeDynamicFlags(U_DYN_FLAG_DEAD);
2851 p_target->sendStopMirrorTimerPacket(MIRROR_TYPE_FIRE);
2852 }
2853 }
2854}
2855
2856void Aura::SpellAuraModDisarm(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2857{
2858 enum AuraModUnitFlag
2859 {
2860 UnitFlag,
2861 UnitFlag2
2862 };
2863
2864 uint32_t flag;
2865 uint16_t field;
2866
2867 switch (aurEff->getAuraEffectType())
2868 {
2869 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_DISARM:
2870 field = UnitFlag;
2871 flag = UNIT_FLAG_DISARMED;
2872 break;
2873#if VERSION_STRING > TBC
2874 // TODO: confirm if this actually exists in tbc -Appled
2875 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_DISARM_OFFHAND:
2876 field = UnitFlag2;
2877 flag = UNIT_FLAG2_DISARM_OFFHAND;
2878 break;
2879 case SPELL_AURA_MOD_DISARM_RANGED:
2880 field = UnitFlag2;
2881 flag = UNIT_FLAG2_DISARM_RANGED;
2882 break;
2883#endif
2884 default:
2885 return;
2886 }
2887
2888 if (apply)
2889 {
2890 if (p_target != nullptr && p_target->isInFeralForm())
2891 return;
2892
2893 mPositive = false;
2894
2895 m_target->m_isDisarmed = true;
2896
2897 if (field == UnitFlag)
2898 m_target->addUnitFlags(flag);
2899#if VERSION_STRING > Classic
2900 else
2901 m_target->addUnitFlags2(flag);
2902#endif
2903 }
2904 else
2905 {
2906 m_target->m_isDisarmed = false;
2907
2908 if (field == UnitFlag)
2909 m_target->removeUnitFlags(flag);
2910#if VERSION_STRING > Classic
2911 else
2912 m_target->removeUnitFlags2(flag);
2913#endif
2914 }
2915}
2916
2917void Aura::SpellAuraModStalked(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
2918{
2919 if (apply)
2920 {
2921 m_target->m_stalkedByGuid = m_casterGuid;
2922 mPositive = false;
2923 }
2924 else
2925 {
2926 m_target->m_stalkedByGuid = 0;
2927 }
2928}
2929
2930void Aura::SpellAuraModSpellCritChanceSchool(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2931{
2932 if (apply)
2933 {
2934 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < TOTAL_SPELL_SCHOOLS; x++)
2935 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
2936 m_target->m_spellCritChanceSchool[x] += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2937 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() < 0)
2938 mPositive = false;
2939 else
2940 mPositive = true;
2941 }
2942 else
2943 {
2944 for (uint32_t x = 0; x < 7; x++)
2945 {
2946 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
2947 {
2948 m_target->m_spellCritChanceSchool[x] -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2949 /*if (m_target->m_spellCritChanceSchool[x] < 0)
2950 m_target->m_spellCritChanceSchool[x] = 0;*/
2951 }
2952 }
2953 }
2954 if (p_target != nullptr)
2955 p_target->updateChanceFields();
2956}
2957
2958void Aura::SpellAuraModPowerCost(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2959{
2960 int32_t val = (apply) ? aurEff->getEffectDamage() : -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
2961 if (apply)
2962 {
2963 if (val > 0)
2964 mPositive = false;
2965 else
2966 mPositive = true;
2967 }
2968 for (uint16_t x = 0; x < 7; x++)
2969 {
2970 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
2971 {
2972 m_target->modPowerCostMultiplier(x, val / 100.0f);
2973 }
2974 }
2975}
2976
2977void Aura::SpellAuraModPowerCostSchool(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2978{
2979 if (apply)
2980 {
2981 for (uint16_t x = 1; x < 7; x++)
2982 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
2983 m_target->modPowerCostModifier(x, aurEff->getEffectDamage());
2984 }
2985 else
2986 {
2987 for (uint16_t x = 1; x < 7; x++)
2988 {
2989 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
2990 {
2991 m_target->modPowerCostModifier(x, -aurEff->getEffectDamage());
2992 }
2993 }
2994 }
2995}
2996
2997void Aura::SpellAuraReflectSpellsSchool(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
2998{
2999 m_target->removeReflect(getSpellId(), apply);
3000
3001 if (apply)
3002 {
3003 int32_t school = 0;
3004 if (m_spellInfo->getAttributes() == 0x400D0 && m_spellInfo->getAttributesEx() == 0)
3005 school = (int)(log10((float)aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()) / log10((float)2));
3006 else
3007 school = m_spellInfo->getFirstSchoolFromSchoolMask();
3008
3009 m_target->m_reflectSpellSchool.emplace_back(std::make_unique<ReflectSpellSchool>(getSpellId(), 0, school, aurEff->getEffectDamage(), false));
3010 }
3011}
3012
3013void Aura::SpellAuraModLanguage(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3014{
3015 if (apply)
3016 m_target->m_modlanguage = aurEff->getEffectMiscValue();
3017 else
3018 m_target->m_modlanguage = -1;
3019}
