3023 if (apply)
3024 {
3025 if (!m_target->isPlayer())
3026 return;
3027
3028 //FIXME:grep aka Nublex will fix this
3029 //Make update circle bigger here
3030 }
3031 else
3032 {
3033 //Destroy new updated objects here if they are still out of update range
3034 //w/e
3035 }
3036}
3037
3038void Aura::SpellAuraMechanicImmunity(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3039{
3040 if (apply)
3041 {
3042 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() < TOTAL_SPELL_MECHANICS)
3043 {
3044 m_target->m_mechanicsDispels[aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()]++;
3045
3046 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() != 16 && aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() != 25 && aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() != 19) // don't remove bandages, Power Word and protection effect
3047 {
3048 /* Supa's test run of Unit::removeAllAurasBySpellMechanic */
3049 m_target->removeAllAurasBySpellMechanic(static_cast<SpellMechanic>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()), false);
3050
3051 //Insignia/Medallion of A/H //Every Man for Himself
3052 if (m_spellInfo->getId() == 42292 || m_spellInfo->getId() == 59752)
3053 {
3054 m_target->removeAllAurasBySpellMechanic(sSpellMgr.getCrowdControlMechanicList(true));
3055 }
3056 }
3057 }
3058 else
3059 mPositive = false;
3060
3061 // Demonic Circle hack
3062 if (m_spellInfo->getId() == 48020 && m_target->isPlayer() && m_target->hasAurasWithId(62388))
3063 {
3064 GameObject* obj = m_target->getWorldMap()->getGameObject(m_target->m_objectSlots[0]);
3065
3066 if (obj != nullptr)
3067 {
3068 Player* ptarget = static_cast< Player* >(m_target);
3069
3070 ptarget->safeTeleport(obj->GetMapId(), obj->GetInstanceID(), LocationVector(obj->GetPositionX(), obj->GetPositionY(), obj->GetPositionZ(), m_target->GetOrientation()));
3071 }
3072 }
3073 }
3074 else
3075 m_target->m_mechanicsDispels[aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()]--;
3076}
3077
3078void Aura::SpellAuraMounted(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3079{
3080 if (!p_target) return;
3081
3082 /*Shady: Is it necessary? Stealth should be broken since all spells with Mounted SpellEffect don't have "does not break stealth" flag (except internal Video mount spell).
3083 So commented, cause we don't need useless checks and hackfixes*/
3084 /* if (m_target->IsStealth())
3085 {
3086 uint32_t id = m_target->m_stealth;
3087 m_target->m_stealth = 0;
3088 m_target->removeAllAurasById(id);
3089 }*/
3090
3091 if (apply)
3092 {
3093 uint32_t creatureEntry = aurEff->getEffectMiscValue();
3094 uint32_t displayId = 0;
3095 uint32_t vehicleId = 0;
3096
3097 mPositive = true;
3098
3099 if (p_target->getBattleground())
3100 p_target->getBattleground()->HookOnMount(p_target);
3101
3102 p_target->dismount();
3103
3104 if (p_target->getShapeShiftForm() && !(p_target->getShapeShiftForm() & (FORM_BATTLESTANCE | FORM_DEFENSIVESTANCE | FORM_BERSERKERSTANCE)))
3105 p_target->removeAllAurasByAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_MOD_SHAPESHIFT);
3106
3107 // Festive Holiday Mount
3108 if (p_target->hasAurasWithId(62061))
3109 {
3110#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC
3111 if (getSpellInfo()->hasEffectApplyAuraName(SPELL_AURA_ENABLE_FLIGHT2))
3112 creatureEntry = 24906;
3113 else
3114#endif
3115 creatureEntry = 15665;
3116 }
3117
3118 if (CreatureProperties const* creatureInfo = sMySQLStore.getCreatureProperties(creatureEntry))
3119 {
3120 displayId = creatureInfo->Male_DisplayID;
3121
3122 vehicleId = creatureInfo->vehicleid;
3123
3124 //some spell has one aura of mount and one of vehicle
3125 for (uint32_t i = 0; i < MAX_SPELL_EFFECTS; ++i)
3126 if (getSpellInfo()->getEffect(i) == SPELL_EFFECT_SUMMON
3127 && getSpellInfo()->getEffectMiscValue(i) == aurEff->getEffectMiscValue())
3128 displayId = 0;
3129 }
3130
3131 p_target->setMountSpellId(m_spellInfo->getId());
3132 p_target->m_flyingAura = 0;
3133
3134 p_target->mount(displayId, vehicleId, creatureEntry);
3135
3136#if VERSION_STRING > WotLK
3137 uint32_t amount = 0;
3138 if (WDB::Structures::MountCapabilityEntry const* mountCapability = m_target->getMountCapability(uint32_t(getSpellInfo()->getEffectMiscValueB(0))))
3139 amount = mountCapability->id;
3140
3141 // cast speed aura
3142 if (WDB::Structures::MountCapabilityEntry const* mountCapability = sMountCapabilityStore.lookupEntry(amount))
3143 p_target->castSpell(p_target, mountCapability->speedModSpell, true);
3144#endif
3145 }
3146 else
3147 {
3148 p_target->setMountVehicleId(0);
3149 p_target->setMountSpellId(0);
3150 p_target->m_flyingAura = 0;
3151
3152 p_target->dismount();
3153
3154#if VERSION_STRING > WotLK
3155 uint32_t amount = 0;
3156 if (WDB::Structures::MountCapabilityEntry const* mountCapability = m_target->getMountCapability(uint32_t(getSpellInfo()->getEffectMiscValueB(0))))
3157 amount = mountCapability->id;
3158
3159 // remove speed aura
3160 if (WDB::Structures::MountCapabilityEntry const* mountCapability = sMountCapabilityStore.lookupEntry(amount))
3161 p_target->removeAllAurasById(mountCapability->speedModSpell);
3162#endif
3163 }
3164}
3165
3166void Aura::SpellAuraModDamagePercDone(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3167{
3168 float val = (apply) ? aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100.0f : -aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100.0f;
3169
3170 switch (getSpellId()) //dirty or mb not fix bug with wand specializations
3171 {
3172 case 14524:
3173 case 14525:
3174 case 14526:
3175 case 14527:
3176 case 14528:
3177 return;
3178 }
3179 if (p_target != nullptr)
3180 {
3181 if (getSpellInfo()->getEquippedItemClass() == -1) //does not depend on weapon
3182 {
3183 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < TOTAL_SPELL_SCHOOLS; x++)
3184 {
3185 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & ((uint32_t)1 << x))
3186 {
3187 // display to client (things that are weapon dependant don't get displayed)
3188 p_target->setModDamageDonePct(p_target->getModDamageDonePct(x) + val, x);
3189 }
3190 }
3191 }
3192 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & 1)
3193 {
3194 if (apply)
3195 {
3196 WeaponModifier md;
3197 md.value = val;
3198 md.wclass = getSpellInfo()->getEquippedItemClass();
3199 md.subclass = getSpellInfo()->getEquippedItemSubClass();
3200 p_target->m_damageDone.insert(std::make_pair(getSpellId(), md));
3201 }
3202 else
3203 {
3204 std::map< uint32_t, WeaponModifier >::iterator i = p_target->m_damageDone.begin();
3205
3206 for (; i != p_target->m_damageDone.end(); ++i)
3207 {
3208 if ((*i).first == getSpellId())
3209 {
3210 p_target->m_damageDone.erase(i);
3211 break;
3212 }
3213 }
3214 p_target->m_damageDone.erase(getSpellId());
3215 }
3216 }
3217 }
3218 else
3219 {
3220 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < 7; x++)
3221 {
3222 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & ((uint32_t)1 << x))
3223 {
3224 static_cast< Creature* >(m_target)->ModDamageDonePct[x] += val;
3225 }
3226 }
3227 }
3228 m_target->calculateDamage();
3229}
3230
3231void Aura::SpellAuraModPercStat(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3232{
3233#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC // support classic
3234 int32_t val;
3235 if (apply)
3236 {
3237 val = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
3238 if (val < 0)
3239 mPositive = false;
3240 else
3241 mPositive = true;
3242 }
3243 else
3244 val = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
3245
3246 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() == -1) //all stats
3247 {
3248 if (p_target != nullptr)
3249 {
3250 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < 5; x++)
3251 {
3252 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0)
3253 p_target->m_statModPctPos[x] += val;
3254 else
3255 p_target->m_statModPctNeg[x] -= val;
3256
3257 p_target->calcStat(x);
3258 }
3259
3260 p_target->updateStats();
3261 p_target->updateChances();
3262 }
3263 else
3264 {
3265 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < 5; x++)
3266 {
3267 static_cast< Creature* >(m_target)->StatModPct[x] += val;
3268 static_cast< Creature* >(m_target)->CalcStat(x);
3269 }
3270 }
3271 }
3272 else
3273 {
3274 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() < 5)
3275 {
3276 uint8_t modValue = static_cast<uint8_t>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue());
3277 if (p_target != nullptr)
3278 {
3279 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0)
3280 p_target->m_statModPctPos[modValue] += val;
3281 else
3282 p_target->m_statModPctNeg[modValue] -= val;
3283
3284 p_target->calcStat(modValue);
3285
3286 p_target->updateStats();
3287 p_target->updateChances();
3288 }
3289 else if (m_target->isCreature())
3290 {
3291 static_cast<Creature*>(m_target)->StatModPct[modValue] += val;
3292 static_cast<Creature*>(m_target)->CalcStat(modValue);
3293 }
3294 }
3295 }
3296#endif
3297}
3298
3299void Aura::SpellAuraSplitDamage(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3300{
3301 Unit* source = nullptr; // This is the Unit whose damage we are splitting
3302 Unit* destination = nullptr; // This is the Unit that shares the beating
3303 Object* caster = getCaster();
3304
3305 // We don't want to split our damage with the owner
3306 if (
3307#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC
3308 (m_spellInfo->getEffect(aurEff->getEffectIndex()) == SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_OWNER_AREA_AURA) &&
3309#endif
3310 (caster != nullptr) &&
3311 (m_target != nullptr) &&
3312 caster->isPet() &&
3313 caster->getGuid() == m_target->getGuid())
3314 return;
3315
3316 if (m_areaAura)
3317 {
3318 source = getOwner();
3319 destination = GetUnitCaster();
3320 }
3321 else
3322 {
3323 source = GetUnitCaster();
3324 destination = getOwner();
3325 }
3326
3327 if (source == nullptr || destination == nullptr)
3328 return;
3329
3330 if (source->m_damageSplitTarget != nullptr)
3331 {
3332 source->m_damageSplitTarget = nullptr;
3333 }
3334
3335 if (apply)
3336 {
3337 auto ds = std::make_unique<DamageSplitTarget>();
3338 ds->m_flatDamageSplit = 0;
3339 ds->m_spellId = getSpellInfo()->getId();
3340 ds->m_pctDamageSplit = aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() / 100.0f;
3341 ds->damage_type = static_cast<uint8_t>(aurEff->getAuraEffectType());
3342 ds->creator = (void*)this;
3343 ds->m_target = destination->getGuid();
3344 source->m_damageSplitTarget = std::move(ds);
3345 }
3346 else
3347 {
3348 source->m_damageSplitTarget = nullptr;
3349 }
3350}
3351
3352void Aura::EventPeriodicDrink(uint32_t amount)
3353{
3354 uint32_t v = m_target->getPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA) + amount;
3355
3356 if (v > m_target->getMaxPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA))
3357 v = m_target->getMaxPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA);
3358
3359 m_target->setPower(POWER_TYPE_MANA, v);
3360}
3361
3362void Aura::EventPeriodicHeal1(uint32_t amount)
3363{
3364 if (!m_target->isAlive())
3365 return;
3366
3367 uint32_t ch = m_target->getHealth();
3368 ch += amount;
3369 uint32_t mh = m_target->getMaxHealth();
3370
3371 if (ch > mh)
3372 m_target->setHealth(mh);
3373 else
3374 m_target->setHealth(ch);
3375
3376 if (getSpellInfo()->getAuraInterruptFlags() & AURA_INTERRUPT_ON_STAND_UP)
3377 {
3378 m_target->emote(EMOTE_ONESHOT_EAT);
3379 }
3380 else
3381 {
3382 if (!(m_spellInfo->custom_BGR_one_buff_on_target & SPELL_TYPE_ARMOR))
3383 m_target->sendPeriodicAuraLog(m_casterGuid, m_target->GetNewGUID(), getSpellInfo(), amount, 0, 0, 0, SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_HEAL_PCT, false);
3384 }
3385
3386 m_target->removeAurasByHeal();
3387}
3388
3389void Aura::SpellAuraChannelDeathItem(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3390{
3391 mPositive = false; //this should always be negative as npcs remove negative auras on death
3392
3393 if (apply)
3394 {
3395 //don't need for now
3396 }
3397 else
3398 {
3399 if (m_target->isCreatureOrPlayer())
3400 {
3401 if (m_target->isCreature() && static_cast<Creature*>(m_target)->GetCreatureProperties()->Type == UNIT_TYPE_CRITTER)
3402 return;
3403
3404 if (m_target->isDead())
3405 {
3406 Player* pCaster = m_target->getWorldMap()->getPlayer((uint32_t)m_casterGuid);
3407 if (!pCaster)
3408 return;
3409 /*int32_t delta=pCaster->getLevel()-m_target->getLevel();
3410 if (abs(delta)>5)
3411 return;*/
3412
3413 uint32_t itemid = getSpellInfo()->getEffectItemType(aurEff->getEffectIndex());
3414
3415 //Warlocks only get Soul Shards from enemies that grant XP or Honor
3416 if (itemid == 6265 && (pCaster->getLevel() > m_target->getLevel()))
3417 if ((pCaster->getLevel() - m_target->getLevel()) > 9)
3418 return;
3419
3420
3421 ItemProperties const* proto = sMySQLStore.getItemProperties(itemid);
3422 if (pCaster->getItemInterface()->CalculateFreeSlots(proto) > 0)
3423 {
3424 auto itemHolder = sObjectMgr.createItem(itemid, pCaster);
3425 if (!itemHolder)
3426 return;
3427
3428 auto* item = itemHolder.get();
3429 item->setCreatorGuid(pCaster->getGuid());
3430 const auto [addResult, _] = pCaster->getItemInterface()->AddItemToFreeSlot(std::move(itemHolder));
3431 if (!addResult)
3432 {
3433 pCaster->getItemInterface()->buildInventoryChangeError(nullptr, nullptr, INV_ERR_INVENTORY_FULL);
3434 return;
3435 }
3436 SlotResult* lr = pCaster->getItemInterface()->LastSearchResult();
3437
3438 pCaster->sendItemPushResultPacket(true, false, true, lr->ContainerSlot, lr->Slot, 1, item->getEntry(), item->getPropertySeed(), item->getRandomPropertiesId(), item->getStackCount());
3439 }
3440 }
3441 }
3442 }
3443}
3444
3445void Aura::SpellAuraModDamagePercTaken(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3446{
3447 float val;
3448 if (apply)
3449 {
3450 val = aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100.0f;
3451 if (val <= 0)
3452 mPositive = true;
3453 else
3454 mPositive = false;
3455 }
3456 else
3457 {
3458 val = -aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100.0f;
3459 }
3460
3461 switch (m_spellInfo->getId()) // Ardent Defender it only applys on 20% hp :/
3462 {
3463 //SPELL_HASH_ARDENT_DEFENDER
3464 case 31850:
3465 case 31851:
3466 case 31852:
3467 case 66233:
3468 case 66235:
3469 m_target->m_damageTakenPctModOnHP35 += val;
3470 break;
3471 default:
3472 break;
3473 }
3474
3475 for (uint32_t x = 0; x < 7; x++)
3476 {
3477 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
3478 {
3479 m_target->m_damageTakenPctMod[x] += val;
3480 }
3481 }
3482}
3483
3484void Aura::SpellAuraModResistChance(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3485{
3486 apply ? m_target->m_resistChance = aurEff->getEffectDamage() : m_target->m_resistChance = 0;
3487}
3488
3489void Aura::SpellAuraModDetectRange(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3490{
3491 Unit* m_caster = GetUnitCaster();
3492 if (!m_caster)return;
3493 if (apply)
3494 {
3495 mPositive = false;
3496 m_caster->setDetectRangeMod(m_target->getGuid(), aurEff->getEffectDamage());
3497 }
3498 else
3499 {
3500 m_caster->unsetDetectRangeMod(m_target->getGuid());
3501 }
3502}
3503
3504void Aura::SpellAuraPreventsFleeing(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool /*apply*/)
3505{
3506 // Curse of Recklessness
3507}
3508
3509void Aura::SpellAuraModUnattackable(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool /*apply*/)
3510{
3511 /*
3512 Also known as Apply Aura: Mod Unintractable
3513 Used by: Spirit of Redemption, Divine Intervention, Phase Shift, Flask of Petrification
3514 It uses one of the UNIT_FIELD_FLAGS, either UNIT_FLAG_NOT_SELECTABLE or UNIT_FLAG_NON_ATTACKABLE
3515 */
3516}
3517
3518void Aura::SpellAuraInterruptRegen(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
3519{
3520 if (apply)
3521 m_target->m_interruptRegen++;
3522 else
3523 {
3524 m_target->m_interruptRegen--;
3525 if (m_target->m_interruptRegen < 0)
3526 m_target->m_interruptRegen = 0;
3527 }
3528}
3529
3530void Aura::SpellAuraGhost(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
3531{
3532 if (p_target != nullptr)
3533 {
3534 if (apply)
3535 {
3536 mPositive = false;
3537 p_target->setMoveWaterWalk();
3538 }
3539 else
3540 {
3541 p_target->setMoveLandWalk();
3542 }
3543 }
3544}
3545
3546void Aura::SpellAuraMagnet(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
3547{
3548 if (apply)
3549 {
3550 Unit* caster = GetUnitCaster();
3551 if (!caster)
3552 return;
3553 mPositive = true;
3554 m_target->m_magnetCasterGuid = caster->getGuid();
3555 }
3556 else
3557 {
3558 m_target->m_magnetCasterGuid = 0;
3559 }
3560}
3561
3562void Aura::SpellAuraManaShield(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3563{
3564 if (apply)
3565 {
3566 mPositive = true;
3567 m_target->m_manashieldAmount = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
3568 m_target->m_manaShieldId = getSpellId();
3569 }
3570 else
3571 {
3572 m_target->m_manashieldAmount = 0;
3573 m_target->m_manaShieldId = 0;
3574 }
3575}
3576
3577void Aura::SpellAuraSkillTalent(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3578{
3579 if (p_target != nullptr)
3580 {
3581 const auto skillLine = static_cast<uint16_t>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue());
3582 const auto amount = static_cast<int16_t>(aurEff->getEffectDamage());
3583
3584 if (apply)
3585 {
3586 if (!p_target->hasSkillLine(skillLine))
3587 {
3588 aurEff->setEffectActive(false);
3589 return;
3590 }
3591
3592 mPositive = true;
3593 p_target->modifySkillBonus(skillLine, amount, true);
3594 }
3595 else
3596 p_target->modifySkillBonus(skillLine, -amount, true);
3597
3598 p_target->updateStats();
3599 }
3600}
3601
3602void Aura::SpellAuraModAttackPower(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3603{
3604 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() < 0)
3605 mPositive = false;
3606 else
3607 mPositive = true;
3608 m_target->modAttackPowerMods(apply ? aurEff->getEffectDamage() : -aurEff->getEffectDamage());
3609 m_target->calculateDamage();
3610}
3611
3612void Aura::SpellAuraVisible(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
3613{
3614 //Show positive spells on target
3615 if (apply)
3616 {
3617 mPositive = false;
3618 }
3619}
3620
3621void Aura::SpellAuraModResistancePCT(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3622{
3623 uint32_t Flag = aurEff->getEffectMiscValue();
3624 int32_t amt;
3625 if (apply)
3626 {
3627 amt = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
3628 // if (amt>0)mPositive = true;
3629 // else mPositive = false;
3630 }
3631 else
3632 amt = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
3633
3634 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < TOTAL_SPELL_SCHOOLS; x++)
3635 {
3636 if (Flag & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
3637 {
3638 if (p_target != nullptr)
3639 {
3640 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0)
3641 {
3642 p_target->m_resistanceModPctPos[x] += amt;
3643 }
3644 else
3645 {
3646 p_target->m_resistanceModPctNeg[x] -= amt;
3647 }
3648 p_target->calcResistance(x);
3649
3650 }
3651 else if (m_target->isCreature())
3652 {
3653 static_cast< Creature* >(m_target)->ResistanceModPct[x] += amt;
3654 static_cast< Creature* >(m_target)->CalcResistance(x);
3655 }
3656 }
3657 }
3658}
3659
3660void Aura::SpellAuraModCreatureAttackPower(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3661{
3662 if (apply)
3663 {
3664 for (uint32_t x = 0; x < 11; x++)
3665 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
3666 m_target->m_creatureAttackPowerMod[x + 1] += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
3667
3668 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0)
3669 mPositive = true;
3670 else
3671 mPositive = false;
3672 }
3673 else
3674 {
3675 for (uint32_t x = 0; x < 11; x++)
3676 {
3677 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
3678 {
3679 m_target->m_creatureAttackPowerMod[x + 1] -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
3680 }
3681 }
3682 }
3683 m_target->calculateDamage();
3684}
3685
3686void Aura::SpellAuraModTotalThreat(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3687{
3688 if (apply)
3689 {
3690 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() < 0)
3691 mPositive = true;
3692 else
3693 mPositive = false;
3694
3695 m_target->modThreatModifyer(aurEff->getEffectDamage());
3696 }
3697 else
3698 m_target->modThreatModifyer(-(aurEff->getEffectDamage()));
3699}
3700
3701void Aura::SpellAuraWaterWalk(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)

3703 if (p_target != nullptr)
3704 {
3705 if (apply)
3706 {
3707 mPositive = true;
3708 p_target->setMoveWaterWalk();
3709 }
3710 else
3711 {
3712 p_target->setMoveLandWalk();
3713 }
3714 }

3716
3717void Aura::SpellAuraFeatherFall(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
3718{
3719 if (p_target == nullptr)
3720 return;
3721
3722 if (apply)
3723 {
3724 mPositive = true;
3725 p_target->setMoveFeatherFall();
3726 p_target->m_noFallDamage = true;
3727 }
3728 else
3729 {
3730 p_target->setMoveNormalFall();
3731 p_target->m_noFallDamage = false;
3732 }
3733}
3734
3735void Aura::SpellAuraHover(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3736{
3737#if VERSION_STRING > TBC
3738 mPositive = true;
3739
3740 if (apply)
3741 {
3742 m_target->setMoveHover(true);
3743 m_target->setHoverHeight(float(aurEff->getEffectDamage()) / 2);
3744 }
3745 else
3746 {
3747 m_target->setMoveHover(false);
3748 m_target->setHoverHeight(0.0f);
3749 }
3750#endif
3751}
3752
3753void Aura::SendDummyModifierLog(std::map< SpellInfo*, uint32_t >* m, SpellInfo* spellInfo, uint32_t i, bool apply, bool pct)
3754{
3755 int32_t v = spellInfo->getEffectBasePoints(static_cast<uint8_t>(i)) + 1;
3756 auto* mask = spellInfo->getEffectSpellClassMask(static_cast<uint8_t>(i));
3757 uint8_t type = static_cast<uint8_t>(spellInfo->getEffectMiscValue(static_cast<uint8_t>(i)));
3758
3759 if (apply)
3760 {
3761 m->insert(std::make_pair(spellInfo, i));
3762 }
3763 else
3764 {
3765 v = -v;
3766 std::map<SpellInfo*, uint32_t>::iterator itr = m->find(spellInfo);
3767 if (itr != m->end())
3768 m->erase(itr);
3769 }
3770
3771#if VERSION_STRING >= Cata
3772 std::vector<std::pair<uint8_t, float>> modValues;
3773#endif
3774 uint32_t intbit = 0, groupnum = 0;
3775 for (uint8_t bit = 0; bit < SPELL_GROUPS; ++bit, ++intbit)
3776 {
3777 if (intbit == 32)
3778 {
3779 ++groupnum;
3780 intbit = 0;
3781 }
3782 if ((1 << intbit) & mask[groupnum])
3783 {
3784 if (p_target == nullptr)
3785 continue;
3786
3787#if VERSION_STRING < Cata
3788 p_target->sendSpellModifierPacket(bit, type, v, pct);
3789#else
3790 modValues.push_back(std::make_pair(bit, static_cast<float>(v)));
3791#endif
3792 }
3793 }
3794
3795#if VERSION_STRING >= Cata
3796 if (p_target != nullptr)
3797 p_target->sendSpellModifierPacket(type, modValues, pct);
3798
3799 modValues.clear();
3800#endif
3801}
3802
3803void Aura::SpellAuraAddClassTargetTrigger(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3804{
3805 if (apply)
3806 {
3807 uint32_t groupRelation[3], procClassMask[3];
3808
3809 // Find spell of effect to be triggered
3810 SpellInfo const* sp = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(getSpellInfo()->getEffectTriggerSpell(aurEff->getEffectIndex()));
3811 if (sp == nullptr)
3812 {
3813 sLogger.debug("Warning! class trigger spell is null for spell {}", getSpellInfo()->getId());
3814 return;
3815 }
3816
3817 // Initialize proc class mask
3818 procClassMask[0] = getSpellInfo()->getEffectSpellClassMask(aurEff->getEffectIndex(), 0);
3819 procClassMask[1] = getSpellInfo()->getEffectSpellClassMask(aurEff->getEffectIndex(), 1);
3820 procClassMask[2] = getSpellInfo()->getEffectSpellClassMask(aurEff->getEffectIndex(), 2);
3821
3822 // Initialize mask
3823 groupRelation[0] = sp->getEffectSpellClassMask(aurEff->getEffectIndex(), 0);
3824 groupRelation[1] = sp->getEffectSpellClassMask(aurEff->getEffectIndex(), 1);
3825 groupRelation[2] = sp->getEffectSpellClassMask(aurEff->getEffectIndex(), 2);
3826
3827 m_target->addProcTriggerSpell(sp->getId(), getSpellInfo()->getId(), m_casterGuid, getSpellInfo()->getEffectBasePoints(aurEff->getEffectIndex()) + 1, SpellProcFlags(getSpellInfo()->getProcFlags()), EXTRA_PROC_NULL, groupRelation, procClassMask, this);
3828
3829 sLogger.debug("{} is registering {} chance {} flags {} charges {}", getSpellInfo()->getId(), sp->getId(), getSpellInfo()->getProcChance(), getSpellInfo()->getProcFlags(), getCharges());
3830 }
3831 else
3832 {
3833 // Find spell of effect to be triggered
3834 uint32_t spellId = getSpellInfo()->getEffectTriggerSpell(aurEff->getEffectIndex());
3835 if (spellId == 0)
3836 {
3837 sLogger.debug("Warning! trigger spell is null for spell {}", getSpellInfo()->getId());
3838 return;
3839 }
3840
3841 m_target->removeProcTriggerSpell(spellId, m_casterGuid);
3842 }
3843}
3844
3845void Aura::SpellAuraOverrideClassScripts(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3846{
3847 Player* plr = GetPlayerCaster();
3848 if (plr == nullptr)
3849 return;
3850
3851 //misc value is spell to add
3852 //spell familyname && grouprelation
3853
3854 //Adding bonus to effect
3855 switch (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue())
3856 {
3857 //----Shatter---
3858 // Increases crit chance against rooted targets by (Rank * 10)%.
3859 case 849:
3860 case 910:
3861 case 911:
3862 case 912:
3863 case 913:
3864 if (p_target != nullptr)
3865 {
3866 int32_t val = (apply) ? (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() - 908) * 10 : -(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() - 908) * 10;
3867 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() == 849)
3868 val = (apply) ? 10 : -10;
3869 p_target->m_rootedCritChanceBonus += val;
3870 }
3871 break;
3872 // ?
3873 case 3736:
3874 case 4415:
3875 case 4418:
3876 case 4554:
3877 case 4555:
3878 case 4953:
3879 case 5142:
3880 case 5147:
3881 case 5148:
3882 case 6953:
3883 {
3884 if (apply)
3885 {
3886 MySQLDataStore::SpellOverrideIdMap::iterator itermap = sMySQLStore._spellOverrideIdStore.find(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue());
3887 if (itermap == sMySQLStore._spellOverrideIdStore.end())
3888 {
3889 sLogger.failure("Unable to find override with overrideid: {}", aurEff->getEffectMiscValue());
3890 break;
3891 }
3892
3893 std::list<SpellInfo const*>::iterator itrSE = itermap->second->begin();
3894
3895 SpellOverrideMap::iterator itr = plr->m_spellOverrideMap.find((*itrSE)->getId());
3896
3897 if (itr != plr->m_spellOverrideMap.end())
3898 {
3899 ScriptOverrideList::iterator itrSO;
3900 for (itrSO = itr->second->begin(); itrSO != itr->second->end(); ++itrSO)
3901 {
3902 if ((*itrSO)->id == (uint32_t)aurEff->getEffectMiscValue())
3903 {
3904 if ((int32_t)(*itrSO)->damage > aurEff->getEffectDamage())
3905 {
3906 (*itrSO)->damage = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
3907 }
3908 return;
3909 }
3910 }
3911
3912 itr->second->emplace_back(std::make_unique<classScriptOverride>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue(), 0, 0, aurEff->getEffectDamage(), false));
3913 }
3914 else
3915 {
3916 auto lst = std::make_shared<ScriptOverrideList>();
3917 lst->emplace_back(std::make_unique<classScriptOverride>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue(), 0, 0, aurEff->getEffectDamage(), false));
3918
3919 for (; itrSE != itermap->second->end(); ++itrSE)
3920 {
3921 plr->m_spellOverrideMap.emplace((*itrSE)->getId(), lst);
3922 }
3923 }
3924 }
3925 else
3926 {
3927 MySQLDataStore::SpellOverrideIdMap::iterator itermap = sMySQLStore._spellOverrideIdStore.find(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue());
3928 SpellOverrideMap::iterator itr = plr->m_spellOverrideMap.begin(), itr2;
3929 while (itr != plr->m_spellOverrideMap.end())
3930 {
3931 std::list<SpellInfo const*>::iterator itrSE = itermap->second->begin();
3932 for (; itrSE != itermap->second->end(); ++itrSE)
3933 {
3934 if (itr->first == (*itrSE)->getId())
3935 {
3936 itr2 = itr++;
3937 plr->m_spellOverrideMap.erase(itr2);
3938 break;
3939 }
3940 }
3941 // Check if the loop above got to the end, if so it means the item wasn't found
3942 // and the itr wasn't incremented so increment it now.
3943 if (itrSE == itermap->second->end())
3944 ++itr;
3945 }
3946 }
3947 }
3948 break;
3949 /* case 19421: //hunter : Improved Hunter's Mark
3950 case 19422:
3951 case 19423:
3952 case 19424:
3953 case 19425:
3954 {
3955 //this should actually add a new functionality to the spell and not override it. There is a lot to decode and to be done here
3956 }break;*/
3957 case 4992: // Warlock: Soul Siphon
3958 case 4993:
3959 {
3960 if (apply)
3961 m_target->m_soulSiphon.m_max += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
3962 else
3963 m_target->m_soulSiphon.m_max -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
3964 }
3965 break;
3966 default:
3967 sLogger.failure("Unknown override report to devs: {}", aurEff->getEffectMiscValue());
3968 };
3969}
3970
3971void Aura::SpellAuraModRangedDamageTaken(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3972{
3973 if (apply)
3974 m_target->m_rangedDamageTaken += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
3975 else
3976 {
3977 m_target->m_rangedDamageTaken -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
3978 if (m_target->m_rangedDamageTaken < 0)
3979 m_target->m_rangedDamageTaken = 0;
3980 }
3981}
3982
3983void Aura::SpellAuraModHealing(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
3984{
3985 int32_t val;
3986 if (apply)
3987 {
3988 val = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
3989 /*if (val>0)
3990 mPositive = true;
3991 else
3992 mPositive = false;*/
3993 }
3994 else
3995 val = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
3996
3997 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < 7; x++)
3998 {
3999 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
4000 {
4001 m_target->m_healTakenMod[x] += val;
4002 }
4003 }
4004}
4005
4006void Aura::SpellAuraModMechanicResistance(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4007{
4008 //silence=26 ?
4009 //mecanics=9 ?
4010 if (apply)
4011 {
4012 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() < TOTAL_SPELL_MECHANICS)
4013 {
4014 m_target->m_mechanicsResistancesPct[aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()] += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4015
4016 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() != MECHANIC_HEALING && aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() != MECHANIC_INVULNARABLE && aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() != MECHANIC_SHIELDED) // don't remove bandages, Power Word and protection effect
4017 {
4018 mPositive = true;
4019 }
4020 else
4021 {
4022 mPositive = false;
4023 }
4024 }
4025 }
4026 else
4027 m_target->m_mechanicsResistancesPct[aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()] -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4028}
4029
4030void Aura::SpellAuraModHealingPCT(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4031{
4032 int32_t val;
4033 if (apply)
4034 {
4035 val = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4036 if (val < 0)
4037 mPositive = false;
4038 else
4039 mPositive = true;
4040 }
4041 else
4042 val = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4043
4044 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < 7; x++)
4045 {
4046 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
4047 {
4048 m_target->m_healTakenPctMod[x] += ((float)(val)) / 100;
4049 }
4050 }
4051}
4052
4053void Aura::SpellAuraUntrackable(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
4054{
4055 if (apply)
4056 m_target->addStandStateFlags(UNIT_STAND_FLAGS_UNTRACKABLE);
4057 else
4058 m_target->removeStandStateFlags(UNIT_STAND_FLAGS_UNTRACKABLE);
4059}
4060
4061void Aura::SpellAuraModRangedAttackPower(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4062{
4063 if (apply)
4064 {
4065 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0)
4066 mPositive = true;
4067 else
4068 mPositive = false;
4069 m_target->modRangedAttackPowerMods(aurEff->getEffectDamage());
4070 }
4071 else
4072 m_target->modRangedAttackPowerMods(-aurEff->getEffectDamage());
4073 m_target->calculateDamage();
4074}
4075
4076void Aura::SpellAuraModMeleeDamageTaken(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4077{
4078 if (apply)
4079 {
4080 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0)//does not exist but let it be
4081 mPositive = false;
4082 else
4083 mPositive = true;
4084 m_target->m_damageTakenMod[0] += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4085 }
4086 else
4087 m_target->m_damageTakenMod[0] -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4088}
4089
4090void Aura::SpellAuraModMeleeDamageTakenPct(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4091{
4092 if (apply)
4093 {
4094 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0) //does not exist but let it be
4095 mPositive = false;
4096 else
4097 mPositive = true;
4098 m_target->m_damageTakenPctMod[0] += aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100.0f;
4099 }
4100 else
4101 m_target->m_damageTakenPctMod[0] -= aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100.0f;
4102}

4108 else
4109 m_target->m_rangeAttackPowerModifier -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();

4112void Aura::SpellAuraModIncreaseSpeedAlways(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4113{
4114 if (apply)
4115 {
4116 mPositive = true;
4117 m_target->m_speedModifier += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4118 }
4119 else
4120 m_target->m_speedModifier -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4121
4122 m_target->updateSpeed();
4123}
4124
4125void Aura::SpellAuraModIncreaseEnergyPerc(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4126{
4127 mPositive = true;
4128
4129 auto modValue = static_cast<PowerType>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue());
4130 if (apply)
4131 {
4132 aurEff->setEffectFixedDamage((m_target->getMaxPower(modValue) * aurEff->getEffectDamage()) / 100);
4133 m_target->modMaxPower(modValue, aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
4134 if (p_target != nullptr && aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() == POWER_TYPE_MANA)
4135 p_target->setManaFromSpell(p_target->getManaFromSpell() + aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
4136 }
4137 else
4138 {
4139 m_target->modMaxPower(modValue, -aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
4140 if (p_target != nullptr && aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() == POWER_TYPE_MANA)
4141 p_target->setManaFromSpell(p_target->getManaFromSpell() - aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
4142 }
4143}
4144
4145void Aura::SpellAuraModIncreaseHealthPerc(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4146{
4147 mPositive = true;
4148 if (apply)
4149 {
4150 aurEff->setEffectFixedDamage((m_target->getMaxHealth() * aurEff->getEffectDamage()) / 100);
4151 m_target->modMaxHealth(aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
4152 if (p_target != nullptr)
4153 p_target->setHealthFromSpell(p_target->getHealthFromSpell() + aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
4154 // else if (m_target->isPet())
4155 // TO< Pet* >(m_target)->SetHealthFromSpell(((Pet*)m_target)->GetHealthFromSpell() + aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
4156 }
4157 else
4158 {
4159 m_target->modMaxHealth(-aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
4160 if (m_target->getHealth() > m_target->getMaxHealth())
4161 m_target->setHealth(m_target->getMaxHealth());
4162 if (p_target != nullptr)
4163 p_target->setHealthFromSpell(static_cast<Player*>(m_target)->getHealthFromSpell() - aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
4164 // else if (m_target->isPet())
4165 // TO< Pet* >(m_target)->SetHealthFromSpell(((Pet*)m_target)->GetHealthFromSpell() - aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
4166 }
4167}
4168
4169void Aura::SpellAuraModManaRegInterrupt(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4170{
4171 if (p_target != nullptr)
4172 {
4173 if (apply)
4174 p_target->m_modInterrManaRegenPct += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4175 else
4176 p_target->m_modInterrManaRegenPct -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4177
4178 p_target->updateStats();
4179 }
4180}
4181
4182void Aura::SpellAuraModTotalStatPerc(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4183{
4184#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC // support classic
4185 int32_t val;
4186 if (apply)
4187 {
4188 val = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4189 }
4190 else
4191 val = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4192
4193 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() == -1) //all stats
4194 {
4195 if (p_target != nullptr)
4196 {
4197 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < 5; x++)
4198 {
4199 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0)
4200 p_target->m_totalStatModPctPos[x] += val;
4201 else
4202 p_target->m_totalStatModPctNeg[x] -= val;
4203 p_target->calcStat(x);
4204 }
4205
4206 p_target->updateStats();
4207 p_target->updateChances();
4208 }
4209 else if (m_target->isCreature())
4210 {
4211 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < 5; x++)
4212 {
4213 static_cast< Creature* >(m_target)->TotalStatModPct[x] += val;
4214 static_cast< Creature* >(m_target)->CalcStat(x);
4215 }
4216 }
4217 }
4218 else
4219 {
4220 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() < 5)
4221 {
4222 if (p_target != nullptr)
4223 {
4224 //druid hearth of the wild should add more features based on form
4225 switch (m_spellInfo->getId())
4226 {
4227 //SPELL_HASH_HEART_OF_THE_WILD
4228 case 17003:
4229 case 17004:
4230 case 17005:
4231 case 17006:
4232 case 24894:
4233 {
4234 //we should remove effect first
4235 p_target->eventTalentHearthOfWildChange(false);
4236 //set new value
4237 if (apply)
4238 p_target->setTalentHearthOfWildPCT(val);
4239 else
4240 p_target->setTalentHearthOfWildPCT(0); //this happens on a talent reset
4241 //reapply
4242 p_target->eventTalentHearthOfWildChange(true);
4243 } break;
4244 }
4245
4246 uint8_t modValue = static_cast<uint8_t>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue());
4247
4248 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0)
4249 p_target->m_totalStatModPctPos[modValue] += val;
4250 else
4251 p_target->m_totalStatModPctNeg[modValue] -= val;
4252
4253 p_target->calcStat(modValue);
4254 p_target->updateStats();
4255 p_target->updateChances();
4256 }
4257 else if (m_target->isCreature())
4258 {
4259 uint8_t modValue = static_cast<uint8_t>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue());
4260
4261 static_cast<Creature*>(m_target)->TotalStatModPct[modValue] += val;
4262 static_cast<Creature*>(m_target)->CalcStat(modValue);
4263 }
4264 }
4265 }
4266#endif
4267}
4268
4269void Aura::SpellAuraModHaste(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4270{
4271 //blade flurry - attack a nearby opponent
4272 switch (m_spellInfo->getId())
4273 {
4274 //SPELL_HASH_BLADE_FLURRY
4275 case 13877:
4276 case 22482:
4277 case 33735:
4278 case 44181:
4279 case 51211:
4280 case 65956:
4281 {
4282 if (apply)
4283 m_target->addExtraStrikeTarget(getSpellInfo(), 0);
4284 else
4285 m_target->removeExtraStrikeTarget(getSpellInfo());
4286 } break;
4287 default:
4288 break;
4289 }
4290
4291 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() < 0)
4292 mPositive = false;
4293 else
4294 mPositive = true;
4295
4296 if (apply)
4297 {
4298 m_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(MELEE, aurEff->getEffectDamage());
4299 m_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(OFFHAND, aurEff->getEffectDamage());
4300
4301 aurEff->setEffectFixedDamage(m_target->getBaseAttackTime(MELEE) * aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100);
4302 if (m_target->isCreature())
4303 static_cast<Creature*>(m_target)->m_speedFromHaste += aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage();
4304 }
4305 else
4306 {
4307 m_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(MELEE, -aurEff->getEffectDamage());
4308 m_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(OFFHAND, -aurEff->getEffectDamage());
4309
4310 if (m_target->isCreature())
4311 static_cast<Creature*>(m_target)->m_speedFromHaste -= aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage();
4312 }
4313
4314 if (m_target->isPlayer())
4315 static_cast<Player*>(m_target)->updateAttackSpeed();
4316}
4317
4318void Aura::SpellAuraForceReaction(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4319{
4320 if (p_target == nullptr)
4321 return;
4322
4323 uint32_t factionId = aurEff->getEffectMiscValue();
4324 Standing factionRank = Standing(aurEff->getEffectDamage());
4325
4326 p_target->applyForcedReaction(factionId, factionRank, apply);
4327 p_target->getSession()->SendPacket(SmsgSetForceReactions(p_target->m_forcedReactions).serialise().get());
4328}
4329
4330void Aura::SpellAuraModRangedHaste(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4331{
4332 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() < 0)
4333 mPositive = false;
4334 else
4335 mPositive = true;
4336
4337 if (apply)
4338 m_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(RANGED, aurEff->getEffectDamage());
4339 else
4340 m_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(RANGED, -aurEff->getEffectDamage());
4341
4342 if (m_target->isPlayer())
4343 static_cast<Player*>(m_target)->updateAttackSpeed();
4344}
4345
4346void Aura::SpellAuraModRangedAmmoHaste(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4347{
4348 mPositive = true;
4349 if (p_target == nullptr)
4350 return;
4351
4352 if (apply)
4353 p_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(RANGED, aurEff->getEffectDamage());
4354 else
4355 p_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(RANGED, -aurEff->getEffectDamage());
4356
4357 p_target->updateAttackSpeed();
4358}
4359
4360void Aura::SpellAuraModResistanceExclusive(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4361{
4362 SpellAuraModResistance(aurEff, apply);
4363}
4364
4365void Aura::SpellAuraResistPushback(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4366{
4367 //DK:This is resist for spell casting delay
4368 //Only use on players for now
4369
4370 if (p_target != nullptr)
4371 {
4372 int32_t val = 0;
4373 if (apply)
4374 {
4375 val = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4376 mPositive = true;
4377 }
4378 else
4379 val = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4380
4381 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < TOTAL_SPELL_SCHOOLS; x++)
4382 {
4383 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
4384 {
4385 p_target->m_spellDelayResist[x] += val;
4386 }
4387 }
4388 }
4389}
4390
4391void Aura::SpellAuraModShieldBlockPCT(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4392{
4393 if (p_target != nullptr)
4394 {
4395 if (apply)
4396 {
4397 p_target->m_modBlockAbsorbValue += (uint32_t)aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4398 }
4399 else
4400 {
4401 p_target->m_modBlockAbsorbValue -= (uint32_t)aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4402 }
4403 p_target->updateStats();
4404 }
4405}
4406
4407void Aura::SpellAuraTrackStealthed(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
4408{
4409 Unit* c = GetUnitCaster();
4410 if (c == nullptr)
4411 return;
4412
4413 c->m_trackStealth = apply;
4414}
4415
4416void Aura::SpellAuraModDetectedRange(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4417{
4418 if (p_target == nullptr)
4419 return;
4420 if (apply)
4421 {
4422 mPositive = true;
4423 p_target->m_detectedRange += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4424 }
4425 else
4426 {
4427 p_target->m_detectedRange -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4428 }
4429}
4430
4431void Aura::SpellAuraSplitDamageFlat(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4432{
4433 if (m_target->m_damageSplitTarget)
4434 {
4435 m_target->m_damageSplitTarget = nullptr;
4436 }
4437
4438 if (apply)
4439 {
4440 auto ds = std::make_unique<DamageSplitTarget>();
4441 ds->m_flatDamageSplit = aurEff->getEffectMiscValue();
4442 ds->m_spellId = getSpellInfo()->getId();
4443 ds->m_pctDamageSplit = 0;
4444 ds->damage_type = static_cast<uint8_t>(aurEff->getAuraEffectType());
4445 ds->creator = (void*)this;
4446 ds->m_target = m_casterGuid;
4447 m_target->m_damageSplitTarget = std::move(ds);
4448 // printf("registering dmg split %u, amount= %u \n",ds->m_spellId, aurEff->getEffectDamage(), aurEff->getEffectMiscValue(), aurEff->getAuraEffect());
4449 }
4450}
4451
4452void Aura::SpellAuraModStealthLevel(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4453{
4454 if (apply)
4455 {
4456 mPositive = true;
4457 m_target->modStealthLevel(StealthFlag(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()), aurEff->getEffectDamage());
4458 }
4459 else
4460 m_target->modStealthLevel(StealthFlag(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()), -aurEff->getEffectDamage());
4461}
4462
4463void Aura::SpellAuraModUnderwaterBreathing(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4464{
4465 if (p_target != nullptr)
4466 {
4467 uint32_t m_UnderwaterMaxTimeSaved = p_target->m_underwaterMaxTime;
4468 if (apply)
4469 p_target->m_underwaterMaxTime *= (1 + aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100);
4470 else
4471 p_target->m_underwaterMaxTime /= (1 + aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100);
4472 p_target->m_underwaterTime *= p_target->m_underwaterMaxTime / m_UnderwaterMaxTimeSaved;
4473 }
4474}
4475

4479 if (p_target != nullptr)
4480 {
4481 if (apply)
4482 {
4483 p_target->m_safeFall += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4484 }
4485 else
4486 {
4487 p_target->m_safeFall -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4488 }
4489 }
4490}
4491
4492void Aura::SpellAuraModReputationAdjust(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4493{
4494 /*mPositive = true;
4495 bool updateclient = true;
4496 if (isPassive())
4497 updateclient = false; // don't update client on passive
4498
4499 if (m_target->getObjectTypeId()==TYPEID_PLAYER)
4500 {
4501 if (apply)
4502 TO< Player* >(m_target)->modPercAllReputation(aurEff->getEffectDamage(), updateclient);
4503 else
4504 TO< Player* >(m_target)->modPercAllReputation(-aurEff->getEffectDamage(), updateclient);
4505 }*/
4506
4507 // This is _actually_ "Reputation gains increased by x%."
4508 // not increase all rep by x%.
4509
4510 if (p_target != nullptr)
4511 {
4512 mPositive = true;
4513 if (apply)
4514 p_target->setPctReputationMod(p_target->getPctReputationMod() + aurEff->getEffectDamage());
4515 else
4516 p_target->setPctReputationMod(p_target->getPctReputationMod() - aurEff->getEffectDamage());
4517 }
4518}

4520void Aura::SpellAuraNoPVPCredit(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
4521{
4522 if (p_target == nullptr)
4523 return;
4524
4525 if (apply)
4526 p_target->incrementHonorless();
4527 else
4528 p_target->decrementHonorless();
4529}

4542 }
4543 }

4547void Aura::SpellAuraWaterBreathing(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
4548{

4550 {
4551 if (apply)
4552 {
4553 mPositive = true;
4554 p_target->sendStopMirrorTimerPacket(MIRROR_TYPE_BREATH);
4555 p_target->m_underwaterState = 0;
4556 }
4557
4558 p_target->m_isWaterBreathingEnabled = apply;
4559 }
4560}

4562void Aura::SpellAuraAPAttackerBonus(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4563{
4564 if (apply)
4565 m_target->m_attackPowerModifier += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4566 else
4567 m_target->m_attackPowerModifier -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4568}
4569
4570
4571void Aura::SpellAuraModPAttackPower(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4572{
4573 //!!probably there is a flag or something that will signal if randeg or melee attack power !!! (still missing)
4574 if (p_target != nullptr)
4575 {
4576 if (apply)
4577 {
4578 p_target->modAttackPowerMultiplier((float)aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100.0f);
4579 }
4580 else
4581 p_target->modAttackPowerMultiplier(-(float)aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100.0f);
4582 p_target->calculateDamage();
4583 }
4584}
4585
4586void Aura::SpellAuraModRangedAttackPowerPct(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4587{
4588 if (m_target->isPlayer())
4589 {
4590 m_target->modRangedAttackPowerMultiplier(((apply) ? 1 : -1) * (float)aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100);
4591 m_target->calculateDamage();
4592 }
4593}
4594
4595void Aura::SpellAuraIncreaseDamageTypePCT(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4596{
4597 if (m_target->isPlayer())
4598 {
4599 if (apply)
4600 {
4601 for (uint32_t x = 0; x < 11; x++)
4602 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
4603 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_increaseDamageByTypePct[x + 1] += ((float)(aurEff->getEffectDamage())) / 100;
4604 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() < 0)
4605 mPositive = false;
4606 else
4607 mPositive = true;
4608 }
4609 else
4610 {
4611 for (uint32_t x = 0; x < 11; x++)
4612 {
4613 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
4614 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_increaseDamageByTypePct[x + 1] -= ((float)(aurEff->getEffectDamage())) / 100;
4615 }
4616 }
4617 }
4618}
4619
4620void Aura::SpellAuraIncreaseCricticalTypePCT(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4621{
4622 if (m_target->isPlayer())
4623 {
4624 if (apply)
4625 {
4626 for (uint32_t x = 0; x < 11; x++)
4627 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
4628 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_increaseCricticalByTypePct[x + 1] += ((float)(aurEff->getEffectDamage())) / 100;
4629 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() < 0)
4630 mPositive = false;
4631 else
4632 mPositive = true;
4633 }
4634 else
4635 {
4636 for (uint32_t x = 0; x < 11; x++)
4637 {
4638 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
4639 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_increaseCricticalByTypePct[x + 1] -= ((float)(aurEff->getEffectDamage())) / 100;
4640 }
4641 }
4642 }
4643}
4644
4645void Aura::SpellAuraIncreasePartySpeed(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4646{
4647 if (m_target->isPlayer() && m_target->isAlive() && m_target->getMountDisplayId() == 0)
4648 {
4649 if (apply)
4650 {
4651 m_target->m_speedModifier += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4652 }
4653 else
4654 {
4655 m_target->m_speedModifier -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4656 }
4657 m_target->updateSpeed();
4658 }
4659}
4660
4661void Aura::SpellAuraIncreaseSpellDamageByAttribute(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4662{
4663 int32_t val;
4664
4665 if (apply)
4666 {
4667 val = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4668 if (val < 0)
4669 mPositive = false;
4670 else
4671 mPositive = true;
4672
4673 aurEff->setEffectFixedDamage(val); //we wish to have the same amount when we are removing the spell as when we were applying !
4674 }
4675 else
4676 val = -aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage();
4677
4678 uint8_t stat = 3;
4679 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < 3; i++)
4680 {
4681 //bit hacky but it will work with all currently available spells
4682 if (m_spellInfo->getEffectApplyAuraName(i) == SPELL_AURA_INCREASE_SPELL_HEALING_PCT)
4683 {
4684 if (m_spellInfo->getEffectMiscValue(i) < 5)
4685 stat = static_cast<uint8_t>(m_spellInfo->getEffectMiscValue(i));
4686 else
4687 return;
4688 }
4689 }
4690
4691 if (m_target->isPlayer())
4692 {
4693 for (uint8_t x = 1; x < TOTAL_SPELL_SCHOOLS; x++)
4694 {
4695 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
4696 {
4697 if (apply)
4698 {
4699 aurEff->setEffectFixedDamage(Util::float2int32(((float)val / 100) * m_target->getStat(stat)));
4700 p_target->modModDamageDonePositive(x, aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
4701 }
4702 else
4703 p_target->modModDamageDonePositive(x, -aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
4704 }
4705 }
4706 p_target->updateChanceFields();
4707 }
4708}
4709
4710void Aura::SpellAuraModSpellDamageByAP(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4711{
4712 int32_t val;
4713
4714 if (apply)
4715 {
4716 //!! caster may log out before spell expires on target !
4717 Unit* pCaster = GetUnitCaster();
4718 if (pCaster == nullptr)
4719 return;
4720
4721 val = aurEff->getEffectDamage() * pCaster->getCalculatedAttackPower() / 100;
4722 if (val < 0)
4723 mPositive = false;
4724 else
4725 mPositive = true;
4726
4727 aurEff->setEffectFixedDamage(val); //we wish to have the same amount when we are removing the spell as when we were applying !
4728 }
4729 else
4730 val = -aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage();
4731
4732 if (m_target->isPlayer())
4733 {
4734 for (uint16_t x = 1; x < 7; x++) //melee damage != spell damage.
4735 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
4736 p_target->modModDamageDonePositive(x, val);
4737
4738 p_target->updateChanceFields();
4739 }
4740}
4741
4742void Aura::SpellAuraIncreaseHealingByAttribute(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4743{
4744#if VERSION_STRING > Classic
4745 int32_t val = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4746
4747 if (apply)
4748 {
4749 if (val < 0)
4750 mPositive = false;
4751 else
4752 mPositive = true;
4753 }
4754
4755 uint8_t stat;
4756 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() < 5)
4757 stat = static_cast<uint8_t>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue());
4758 else
4759 {
4760 sLogger.failure("Aura::SpellAuraIncreaseHealingByAttribute::Unknown spell attribute type {} in spell {}.\n", aurEff->getEffectMiscValue(), getSpellId());
4761 return;
4762 }
4763
4764 if (p_target != nullptr)
4765 {
4766 p_target->updateChanceFields();
4767 if (apply)
4768 {
4769 aurEff->setEffectFixedDamage(Util::float2int32(((float)val / 100.0f) * p_target->getStat(stat)));
4770 p_target->modModHealingDone(aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
4771 }
4772 else
4773 p_target->modModHealingDone(-aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
4774
4775 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < TOTAL_SPELL_SCHOOLS; ++i)
4776 {
4777 if (apply)
4778 p_target->m_healDoneMod[i] += aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage();
4779 else
4780 p_target->m_healDoneMod[i] -= aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage();
4781 }
4782 }
4783#endif
4784}
4785
4786void Aura::SpellAuraModHealingByAP(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4787{
4788#if VERSION_STRING > Classic
4789 int32_t val;
4790
4791 if (apply)
4792 {
4793 //!! caster may log out before spell expires on target !
4794 Unit* pCaster = GetUnitCaster();
4795 if (pCaster == nullptr)
4796 return;
4797
4798 val = aurEff->getEffectDamage() * pCaster->getCalculatedAttackPower() / 100;
4799 if (val < 0)
4800 mPositive = false;
4801 else
4802 mPositive = true;
4803
4804 aurEff->setEffectFixedDamage(val); //we wish to have the same amount when we are removing the spell as when we were applying !
4805 }
4806 else
4807 val = -aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage();
4808
4809
4810
4811 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < TOTAL_SPELL_SCHOOLS; x++)
4812 {
4813 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
4814 {
4815 m_target->m_healDoneMod[x] += val;
4816 }
4817 }
4818
4819 if (p_target != nullptr)
4820 {
4821 p_target->modModHealingDone(val);
4822 p_target->updateChanceFields();
4823 }
4824#endif
4825}
4826
4827void Aura::SpellAuraModHealingDone(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4828{
4829#if VERSION_STRING > Classic
4830 int32_t val;
4831 if (apply)
4832 {
4833 val = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4834 if (val < 0)
4835 mPositive = false;
4836 else
4837 mPositive = true;
4838 }
4839 else
4840 val = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4841
4842 uint32_t player_class = m_target->getClass();
4843 if (player_class == DRUID || player_class == PALADIN || player_class == SHAMAN || player_class == PRIEST)
4844 val = Util::float2int32(val * 1.88f);
4845
4846 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < TOTAL_SPELL_SCHOOLS; x++)
4847 {
4848 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
4849 {
4850 m_target->m_healDoneMod[x] += val;
4851 }
4852 }
4853 if (p_target != nullptr)
4854 {
4855 p_target->updateChanceFields();
4856 p_target->modModHealingDone(val);
4857 }
4858#endif
4859}
4860
4861void Aura::SpellAuraModHealingDonePct(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4862{
4863 int32_t val;
4864 if (apply)
4865 {
4866 val = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4867 if (val < 0)
4868 mPositive = false;
4869 else
4870 mPositive = true;
4871 }
4872 else
4873 val = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4874
4875 for (uint32_t x = 0; x < 7; x++)
4876 {
4877 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
4878 {
4879 m_target->m_healDonePctMod[x] += ((float)(val)) / 100;
4880 }
4881 }
4882}
4883
4884void Aura::SpellAuraEmphaty(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
4885{
4886 mPositive = true;
4887 Player* caster = GetPlayerCaster();
4888 if (caster == nullptr)
4889 return;
4890
4891 // Show extra info about beast
4892 uint32_t dynflags = m_target->getDynamicFlags();
4893 if (apply)
4894 dynflags |= U_DYN_FLAG_PLAYER_INFO;
4895
4896#if VERSION_STRING < Mop
4897 m_target->BuildFieldUpdatePacket(caster, getOffsetForStructuredField(WoWUnit, dynamic_flags), dynflags);
4898#else
4899 m_target->BuildFieldUpdatePacket(caster, getOffsetForStructuredField(WoWObject, dynamic_field), dynflags);
4900#endif
4901}
4902
4903void Aura::SpellAuraModOffhandDamagePCT(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4904{
4905 //Used only by talents of rogue and warrior;passive,positive
4906 if (p_target != nullptr)
4907 {
4908 if (apply)
4909 {
4910 mPositive = true;
4911 p_target->m_offhandDmgMod *= (100 + aurEff->getEffectDamage()) / 100.0f;
4912 }
4913 else
4914 p_target->m_offhandDmgMod /= (100 + aurEff->getEffectDamage()) / 100.0f;
4915
4916 p_target->calculateDamage();
4917 }
4918}
4919
4920void Aura::SpellAuraModPenetration(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply) // armor penetration & spell penetration
4921{
4922 //SPELL_HASH_SERRATED_BLADES
4923 if (m_spellInfo->getId() == 14171 || m_spellInfo->getId() == 14172 || m_spellInfo->getId() == 14173)
4924 {
4925 if (p_target == nullptr)
4926 return;
4927
4928 if (apply)
4929 {
4930 if (m_spellInfo->getId() == 14171)
4931 p_target->m_powerCostPctMod[0] += m_target->getLevel() * 2.67f;
4932 else if (m_spellInfo->getId() == 14172)
4933 p_target->m_powerCostPctMod[0] += m_target->getLevel() * 5.43f;
4934 else if (m_spellInfo->getId() == 14173)
4935 p_target->m_powerCostPctMod[0] += m_target->getLevel() * 8.0f;
4936 }
4937 else
4938 {
4939 if (m_spellInfo->getId() == 14171)
4940 p_target->m_powerCostPctMod[0] -= m_target->getLevel() * 2.67f;
4941 else if (m_spellInfo->getId() == 14172)
4942 p_target->m_powerCostPctMod[0] -= m_target->getLevel() * 5.43f;
4943 else if (m_spellInfo->getId() == 14173)
4944 p_target->m_powerCostPctMod[0] -= m_target->getLevel() * 8.0f;
4945 }
4946 return;
4947 }
4948
4949 if (apply)
4950 {
4951 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() < 0)
4952 mPositive = true;
4953 else
4954 mPositive = false;
4955
4956 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < 7; x++)
4957 {
4958 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
4959 m_target->m_powerCostPctMod[x] -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4960 }
4961
4962 if (p_target != nullptr)
4963 {
4964#if VERSION_STRING != Classic
4965 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & 124)
4966 p_target->modModTargetResistance(aurEff->getEffectDamage());
4967 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & 1)
4968 p_target->modModTargetPhysicalResistance(aurEff->getEffectDamage());
4969#endif
4970 }
4971 }
4972 else
4973 {
4974 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < 7; x++)
4975 {
4976 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
4977 m_target->m_powerCostPctMod[x] += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
4978 }
4979 if (p_target != nullptr)
4980 {
4981#if VERSION_STRING != Classic
4982 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & 124)
4983 p_target->modModTargetResistance(-aurEff->getEffectDamage());
4984 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & 1)
4985 p_target->modModTargetPhysicalResistance(-aurEff->getEffectDamage());
4986#endif
4987 }
4988 }
4989}
4990
4991void Aura::SpellAuraIncreaseArmorByPctInt(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
4992{
4993 uint32_t i_Int = m_target->getStat(STAT_INTELLECT);
4994
4995 int32_t amt = Util::float2int32(i_Int * ((float)aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100.0f));
4996 amt *= (!apply) ? -1 : 1;
4997
4998 for (uint8_t x = 0; x < TOTAL_SPELL_SCHOOLS; x++)
4999 {
5000 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
5001 {
5002 if (p_target != nullptr)
5003 {
5004 p_target->m_flatResistanceModifierPos[x] += amt;
5005 p_target->calcResistance(x);
5006 }
5007 else if (m_target->isCreature())
5008 {
5009 static_cast< Creature* >(m_target)->FlatResistanceMod[x] += amt;
5010 static_cast< Creature* >(m_target)->CalcResistance(x);
5011 }
5012 }
5013 }
5014}
5015
5016void Aura::SpellAuraReduceAttackerMHitChance(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5017{
5018 if (p_target == nullptr)
5019 return;
5020 if (apply)
5021 p_target->m_resistHit[MOD_MELEE] += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5022 else
5023 p_target->m_resistHit[MOD_MELEE] -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5024}
5025
5026void Aura::SpellAuraReduceAttackerRHitChance(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5027{
5028 if (p_target == nullptr)
5029 return;
5030 if (apply)
5031 p_target->m_resistHit[MOD_RANGED] += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5032 else
5033 p_target->m_resistHit[MOD_RANGED] -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5034}
5035
5036void Aura::SpellAuraReduceAttackerSHitChance(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5037{
5038 if (p_target == nullptr)
5039 return;
5040 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < TOTAL_SPELL_SCHOOLS; i++)
5041 {
5042 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (1 << i)) // check school
5043 {
5044 // signs reversed intentionally
5045 if (apply)
5046 p_target->m_resistHitSpell[i] -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5047 else
5048 p_target->m_resistHitSpell[i] += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5049 }
5050 }
5051}
5052
5053void Aura::SpellAuraReduceEnemyMCritChance(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5054{
5055 if (!m_target->isPlayer())
5056 return;
5057
5058 if (const auto targetPlayer = dynamic_cast<Player*>(m_target))
5059 {
5060 //value is negative percent
5061 if (apply)
5062 targetPlayer->setResistMCrit(targetPlayer->getResistMCrit() + static_cast<float>(aurEff->getEffectDamage()));
5063 else
5064 targetPlayer->setResistMCrit(targetPlayer->getResistMCrit() - static_cast<float>(aurEff->getEffectDamage()));
5065 }
5066}
5067
5068void Aura::SpellAuraReduceEnemyRCritChance(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5069{
5070 if (!m_target->isPlayer())
5071 return;
5072
5073 if (const auto targetPlayer = dynamic_cast<Player*>(m_target))
5074 {
5075 //value is negative percent
5076 if (apply)
5077 targetPlayer->setResistRCrit(targetPlayer->getResistRCrit() + static_cast<float>(aurEff->getEffectDamage()));
5078 else
5079 targetPlayer->setResistRCrit(targetPlayer->getResistRCrit() - static_cast<float>(aurEff->getEffectDamage()));
5080 }
5081}
5082
5083void Aura::SpellAuraLimitSpeed(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5084{
5085 int32_t amount = (apply) ? aurEff->getEffectDamage() : -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5086 m_target->m_maxSpeed += (float)amount;
5087 m_target->updateSpeed();
5088}
5089void Aura::SpellAuraIncreaseTimeBetweenAttacksPCT(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5090{
5091 int32_t val = (apply) ? aurEff->getEffectDamage() : -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5092 float pct_value = -val / 100.0f;
5093 m_target->modModCastSpeed(pct_value);
5094}
5095
5096void Aura::SpellAuraMeleeHaste(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5097{
5098 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() < 0)
5099 mPositive = false;
5100 else
5101 mPositive = true;
5102
5103 if (apply)
5104 {
5105 m_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(MELEE, aurEff->getEffectDamage());
5106 m_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(OFFHAND, aurEff->getEffectDamage());
5107 m_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(RANGED, aurEff->getEffectDamage());
5108 }
5109 else
5110 {
5111 m_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(MELEE, -aurEff->getEffectDamage());
5112 m_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(OFFHAND, -aurEff->getEffectDamage());
5113 m_target->modAttackSpeedModifier(RANGED, -aurEff->getEffectDamage());
5114 }
5115
5116 if (m_target->isPlayer())
5117 static_cast<Player*>(m_target)->updateAttackSpeed();
5118}

5178
5179void Aura::SpellAuraIncreaseAllWeaponSkill(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5180{
5181 if (m_target->isPlayer())
5182 {
5183 const auto amount = static_cast<int16_t>(aurEff->getEffectDamage());
5184 if (apply)
5185 {
5186 mPositive = true;
5187 // TO< Player* >(m_target)->ModSkillBonusType(SKILL_TYPE_WEAPON, aurEff->getEffectDamage());
5188 //since the frikkin above line does not work we have to do it manually
5189 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_SWORDS, amount, true);
5190 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_AXES, amount, true);
5191 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_BOWS, amount, true);
5192 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_GUNS, amount, true);
5193 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_MACES, amount, true);
5194 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_2H_SWORDS, amount, true);
5195 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_STAVES, amount, true);
5196 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_2H_MACES, amount, true);
5197 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_2H_AXES, amount, true);
5198 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_DAGGERS, amount, true);
5199 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_CROSSBOWS, amount, true);
5200 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_WANDS, amount, true);
5201 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_POLEARMS, amount, true);
5202 }
5203 else
5204 {
5205 // TO< Player* >(m_target)->ModSkillBonusType(SKILL_TYPE_WEAPON, -aurEff->getEffectDamage());
5206 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_SWORDS, -amount, true);
5207 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_AXES, -amount, true);
5208 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_BOWS, -amount, true);
5209 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_GUNS, -amount, true);
5210 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_MACES, -amount, true);
5211 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_2H_SWORDS, -amount, true);
5212 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_STAVES, -amount, true);
5213 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_2H_MACES, -amount, true);
5214 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_2H_AXES, -amount, true);
5215 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_DAGGERS, -amount, true);
5216 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_CROSSBOWS, -amount, true);
5217 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_WANDS, -amount, true);
5218 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifySkillBonus(SKILL_POLEARMS, -amount, true);
5219 }
5220
5221 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->updateStats();
5222 }
5223}
5224
5225void Aura::SpellAuraIncreaseHitRate(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5226{
5227 if (!m_target->isPlayer())
5228 return;
5229
5230 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->modifyBonuses(ITEM_MOD_SPELL_HIT_RATING, aurEff->getEffectDamage(), apply);
5231 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->updateStats();
5232}

5234void Aura::SpellAuraIncreaseRageFromDamageDealtPCT(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5235{
5236 if (!m_target->isPlayer())
5237 return;
5238
5239 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_rageFromDamageDealt += (apply) ? aurEff->getEffectDamage() : -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5240}

5242int32_t Aura::event_GetInstanceID()
5243{
5244 return m_target->event_GetInstanceID();
5245}
