5248{
5249 event_Relocate();
5250}
5251
5252void Aura::SpellAuraReduceCritMeleeAttackDmg(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5253{
5254 signed int val;
5255 if (apply)
5256 val = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5257 else
5258 val = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5259
5260 for (uint32_t x = 1; x < 7; x++)
5261 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
5262 m_target->m_critMeleeDamageTakenPctMod[x] += val / 100.0f;
5263}
5264
5265void Aura::SpellAuraReduceCritRangedAttackDmg(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5266{
5267 signed int val;
5268 if (apply)
5269 val = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5270 else
5271 val = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5272
5273 for (uint32_t x = 1; x < 7; x++)
5274 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
5275 m_target->m_critRangedDamageTakenPctMod[x] += val / 100.0f;
5276}
5277
5278void Aura::SpellAuraEnableFlight(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5279{
5280 if (apply)
5281 {
5282 m_target->setMoveCanFly(true);
5283 m_target->m_flyspeedModifier += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5284 m_target->updateSpeed();
5285 if (m_target->isPlayer())
5286 {
5287 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_flyingAura = m_spellInfo->getId();
5288 }
5289 }
5290 else
5291 {
5292 m_target->setMoveCanFly(false);
5293 m_target->m_flyspeedModifier -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5294 m_target->updateSpeed();
5295 if (m_target->isPlayer())
5296 {
5297 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_flyingAura = 0;
5298 }
5299 }
5300}
5301
5302void Aura::SpellAuraEnableFlightWithUnmountedSpeed(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5303{
5304 // Used in flight form (only so far)
5305 if (apply)
5306 {
5307 m_target->setMoveCanFly(true);
5308 m_target->m_flyspeedModifier += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5309 m_target->updateSpeed();
5310 if (m_target->isPlayer())
5311 {
5312 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_flyingAura = m_spellInfo->getId();
5313 }
5314 }
5315 else
5316 {
5317 m_target->setMoveCanFly(false);
5318 m_target->m_flyspeedModifier -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5319 m_target->updateSpeed();
5320 if (m_target->isPlayer())
5321 {
5322 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_flyingAura = 0;
5323 }
5324 }
5325}
5326
5327void Aura::SpellAuraIncreaseMovementAndMountedSpeed(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5328{
5329 if (apply)
5330 m_target->m_mountedspeedModifier += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5331 else
5332 m_target->m_mountedspeedModifier -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5333 m_target->updateSpeed();
5334}
5335
5336void Aura::SpellAuraIncreaseFlightSpeed(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5337{
5338 if (apply)
5339 m_target->m_flyspeedModifier += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5340 else
5341 m_target->m_flyspeedModifier -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5342 m_target->updateSpeed();
5343}
5344
5345
5346void Aura::SpellAuraIncreaseRating(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5347{
5348 int v = apply ? aurEff->getEffectDamage() : -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5349
5350 if (!m_target->isPlayer())
5351 return;
5352
5353 Player* plr = static_cast< Player* >(m_target);
5354 for (uint32_t x = 1; x < 24; x++) //skip x= 0
5355 if ((((uint32_t)1) << x) & aurEff->getEffectMiscValue())
5356 plr->modifyBonuses(11 + x, aurEff->getEffectDamage(), apply);
5357
5358 //MELEE_CRITICAL_AVOIDANCE_RATING + RANGED_CRITICAL_AVOIDANCE_RATING + SPELL_CRITICAL_AVOIDANCE_RATING
5359 //comes only as combination of them - ModifyBonuses() not adding them individually anyhow
5360 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (0x0004000 | 0x0008000 | 0x0010000))
5361 plr->modifyBonuses(ITEM_MOD_RESILIENCE_RATING, aurEff->getEffectDamage(), apply);
5362
5363 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & 1) //weapon skill
5364 {
5365 std::map<uint32_t, uint32_t>::iterator i;
5366 for (uint32_t y = 0; y < 20; y++)
5367 if (m_spellInfo->getEquippedItemSubClass() & (((uint32_t)1) << y))
5368 {
5369 i = static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_wratings.find(y);
5370 if (i == static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_wratings.end()) //no prev
5371 {
5372 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_wratings[y] = v;
5373 }
5374 else
5375 {
5376 i->second += v;
5377 if (i->second == 0)
5378 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_wratings.erase(i);
5379 }
5380 }
5381 }
5382
5383 plr->updateStats();
5384}
5385
5386void Aura::SpellAuraRegenManaStatPCT(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5387{
5388 if (!m_target->isPlayer())
5389 return;
5390
5391 if (apply)
5392 static_cast<Player*>(m_target)->m_modManaRegenFromStat[aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()] += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5393 else
5394 static_cast<Player*>(m_target)->m_modManaRegenFromStat[aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()] -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5395
5396 static_cast<Player*>(m_target)->updateStats();
5397}
5398
5399void Aura::SpellAuraSpellHealingStatPCT(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5400{
5401#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC // support classic
5402 if (!m_target->isPlayer())
5403 return;
5404
5405 if (apply)
5406 {
5407 //mPositive = true;
5408 /*aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage() = (aurEff->getEffectDamage() * m_target->getStat(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()) /1 00;
5409
5410 for (uint32_t x = 1; x < 7; x++)
5411 m_target->m_healDoneMod[x] += aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage();*/
5412
5413 aurEff->setEffectFixedDamage(((m_target->getStat(STAT_SPIRIT) * aurEff->getEffectDamage()) / 100));
5414
5415 static_cast<Player*>(m_target)->modifyBonuses(ITEM_MOD_CRITICAL_STRIKE_RATING, aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage(), true);
5416 static_cast<Player*>(m_target)->updateChances();
5417 }
5418 else
5419 {
5420 /*for (uint32_t x = 1; x < 7; x++)
5421 m_target->m_healDoneMod[x] -= aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage();*/
5422
5423 static_cast<Player*>(m_target)->modifyBonuses(ITEM_MOD_CRITICAL_STRIKE_RATING, aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage(), false);
5424 static_cast<Player*>(m_target)->updateChances();
5425 }
5426#endif
5427}
5428
5429void Aura::SpellAuraAllowFlight(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
5430{
5431 m_target->setMoveCanFly(apply);
5432}
5433
5434void Aura::SpellAuraFinishingMovesCannotBeDodged(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
5435{
5436 if (apply)
5437 {
5438 if (!m_target->isPlayer())
5439 return;
5440
5441 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_finishingMovesDodge = true;
5442 }
5443 else
5444 {
5445 if (!m_target->isPlayer())
5446 return;
5447
5448 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->m_finishingMovesDodge = false;
5449 }
5450}
5451
5452void Aura::SpellAuraReduceAOEDamageTaken(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5453{
5454 float val = aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100.0f;
5455 if (apply)
5456 {
5457 aurEff->setEffectFixedDamage((int)(m_target->m_AOEDmgMod * val));
5458 m_target->m_AOEDmgMod += aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage();
5459 }
5460 else
5461 {
5462 m_target->m_AOEDmgMod -= aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage();
5463 }
5464}
5465
5466void Aura::SpellAuraIncreaseMaxHealth(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5467{
5468 //should only be used by a player
5469 //and only ever target players
5470 if (!m_target->isPlayer())
5471 return;
5472
5473 int32_t amount;
5474 if (apply)
5475 amount = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5476 else
5477 amount = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5478
5479 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->setHealthFromSpell(static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->getHealthFromSpell() + amount);
5480 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->updateStats();
5481}
5482
5483void Aura::SpellAuraSpiritOfRedemption(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
5484{
5485 if (!m_target->isPlayer())
5486 return;
5487
5488 if (apply)
5489 {
5490 m_target->setScale(0.5);
5491 m_target->setHealth(1);
5492 SpellInfo const* sorInfo = sSpellMgr.getSpellInfo(27792);
5493 Spell* sor = sSpellMgr.newSpell(m_target, sorInfo, true, nullptr);
5494 SpellCastTargets spellTargets(m_target->getGuid());
5495 sor->prepare(&spellTargets);
5496 }
5497 else
5498 {
5499 m_target->setScale(1);
5500 m_target->removeAllAurasById(27792);
5501 m_target->setHealth(0);
5502 }
5503}
5504
5505void Aura::SpellAuraIncreaseAttackerSpellCrit(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5506{
5507 int32_t val = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5508
5509 if (apply)
5510 {
5511 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0)
5512 mPositive = false;
5513 else
5514 mPositive = true;
5515 }
5516 else
5517 val = -val;
5518
5519 for (uint32_t x = 0; x < 7; x++)
5520 {
5521 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
5522 m_target->m_attackerCritChanceMod[x] += val;
5523 }
5524}
5525
5526void Aura::SpellAuraIncreaseRepGainPct(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5527{
5528 if (p_target)
5529 {
5530 mPositive = true;
5531 if (apply)
5532 p_target->setPctReputationMod(p_target->getPctReputationMod() + aurEff->getEffectDamage());
5533 else
5534 p_target->setPctReputationMod(p_target->getPctReputationMod() - aurEff->getEffectDamage());
5535 }
5536}
5537
5538void Aura::SpellAuraIncreaseRAPbyStatPct(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5539{
5540 if (apply)
5541 {
5542 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0)
5543 mPositive = true;
5544 else
5545 mPositive = false;
5546
5547 uint8_t modValue = static_cast<uint8_t>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue());
5548 aurEff->setEffectFixedDamage(m_target->getStat(modValue) * aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100);
5549 m_target->modRangedAttackPowerMods(aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
5550 }
5551 else
5552 m_target->modRangedAttackPowerMods(-aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
5553
5554 m_target->calculateDamage();
5555}
5556
5557/* not used
5558void Aura::SpellAuraModRangedDamageTakenPCT(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5559{
5560if (apply)
5561m_target->RangedDamageTakenPct += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5562else
5563m_target->RangedDamageTakenPct -= aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5564}*/
5565
5566void Aura::SpellAuraModBlockValue(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5567{
5568 if (p_target != nullptr)
5569 {
5570 int32_t amt;
5571 if (apply)
5572 {
5573 amt = aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5574 if (amt < 0)
5575 mPositive = false;
5576 else
5577 mPositive = true;
5578 }
5579 else
5580 {
5581 amt = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5582 }
5583 p_target->m_modBlockValueFromSpells += amt;
5584 p_target->updateStats();
5585 }
5586}
5587
5588void Aura::SendChannelUpdate(uint32_t time, Object* m_caster)
5589{
5590 m_caster->sendMessageToSet(MsgChannelUpdate(m_caster->GetNewGUID(), time).serialise().get(), true);
5591}
5592
5593void Aura::SpellAuraExpertise(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool /*apply*/)
5594{
5595 if (p_target == nullptr)
5596 return;
5597
5598 p_target->calcExpertise();
5599}
5600
5601void Aura::SpellAuraForceMoveForward(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
5602{
5603#if VERSION_STRING != Classic
5604 if (apply)
5605 m_target->addUnitFlags2(UNIT_FLAG2_FORCE_MOVE);
5606 else
5607 m_target->removeUnitFlags2(UNIT_FLAG2_FORCE_MOVE);
5608#endif
5609}
5610
5611void Aura::SpellAuraComprehendLang(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
5612{
5613#if VERSION_STRING != Classic
5614 if (apply)
5615 m_target->addUnitFlags2(UNIT_FLAG2_COMPREHEND_LANG);
5616 else
5617 m_target->removeUnitFlags2(UNIT_FLAG2_COMPREHEND_LANG);
5618#endif
5619}
5620
5621void Aura::SpellAuraModPossessPet(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
5622{
5623 Player* pCaster = GetPlayerCaster();
5624 if (pCaster == nullptr || !pCaster->IsInWorld())
5625 return;
5626
5627 if (!m_target->isPet() || m_target->getPlayerOwner() != pCaster)
5628 return;
5629
5630 if (apply)
5631 {
5632 pCaster->possess(m_target);
5633 pCaster->speedCheatDelay(getTimeLeft());
5634 }
5635 else
5636 {
5637 pCaster->unPossess();
5638 }
5639}
5640
5641void Aura::SpellAuraReduceEffectDuration(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5642{
5643 if (!m_target->isPlayer())
5644 return;
5645
5646 int32_t val;
5647 if (apply)
5648 {
5649 mPositive = true;
5650 val = aurEff->getEffectDamage(); ///\todo Only maximum effect should be used for Silence or Interrupt effects reduction
5651 }
5652 else
5653 {
5654 val = -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5655 }
5656 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() > 0 && aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() < 28)
5657 {
5658 m_target->m_mechanicDurationPctMod[aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()] += val;
5659 }
5660}
5661
5662// Caster = player
5663// Target = vehicle
5664void Aura::HandleAuraControlVehicle(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5665{
5666#ifdef FT_VEHICLES
5667 if (!getCaster())
5668 return;
5669
5670 if (!getCaster()->isCreatureOrPlayer())
5671 return;
5672
5673 if (m_target->isCreature() && !m_target->isVehicle() || !m_target->getVehicleKit())
5674 return;
5675
5676 Unit* caster = static_cast<Unit*>(getCaster());
5677 auto seatId = static_cast<int8_t>(aurEff->getEffectBaseDamage() - 1);
5678
5679 if (apply)
5680 {
5681 caster->enterVehicle(m_target->getVehicleKit(), seatId);
5682 }
5683 else
5684 {
5685 if (getSpellId() == 53111) // Devour Humanoid
5686 {
5687 if (caster->getObjectTypeId() == TYPEID_UNIT)
5688 caster->ToCreature()->Despawn(0, 0);
5689 }
5690
5691 if (seatId == m_target->getVehicleKit()->getSeatForNumberPassenger(caster))
5692 caster->exitVehicle();
5693 else if (seatId >= 0)
5694 m_target->getVehicleKit()->removePassenger(caster);
5695 else
5696 caster->exitVehicle();
5697
5698 // some SPELL_AURA_CONTROL_VEHICLE auras have a dummy effect on the player - remove them
5699 caster->removeAllAurasById(getSpellId());
5700 }
5701#endif
5702}
5703
5704void Aura::SpellAuraModCombatResultChance(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5705{
5706 if (apply)
5707 {
5708 switch (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue())
5709 {
5710 case 1:
5711 //m_target->m_CombatResult_Parry += aurEff->getEffectDamage(); // parry?
5712 break;
5713 case 2:
5714 m_target->m_CombatResult_Dodge += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5715 break;
5716 }
5717 }
5718 else
5719 {
5720 switch (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue())
5721 {
5722 case 1:
5723 //m_target->m_CombatResult_Parry += -aurEff->getEffectDamage(); // parry?
5724 break;
5725 case 2:
5726 m_target->m_CombatResult_Dodge += -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5727 break;
5728 }
5729 }
5730}
5731
5732void Aura::SpellAuraAddHealth(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5733{
5734 if (apply)
5735 {
5736 mPositive = true;
5737 m_target->modMaxHealth(aurEff->getEffectDamage());
5738 m_target->modHealth(aurEff->getEffectDamage());
5739 }
5740 else
5741 {
5742 m_target->modMaxHealth(-aurEff->getEffectDamage());
5743 uint32_t maxHealth = m_target->getMaxHealth();
5744 if (m_target->getHealth() > maxHealth)
5745 m_target->setMaxHealth(maxHealth);
5746 }
5747}
5748
5749void Aura::SpellAuraRemoveReagentCost(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
5750{
5751 if (p_target == nullptr)
5752 return;
5753
5754#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC
5755 if (apply)
5756 {
5757 p_target->addUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_NO_REAGANT_COST);
5758 }
5759 else
5760 {
5761 p_target->removeUnitFlags(UNIT_FLAG_NO_REAGANT_COST);
5762 }
5763#endif
5764}
5765void Aura::SpellAuraBlockMultipleDamage(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5766{
5767 if (p_target == nullptr)
5768 return;
5769
5770 if (apply)
5771 p_target->m_blockModPct += aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5772 else
5773 p_target->m_blockModPct += -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5774}
5775
5776void Aura::SpellAuraModMechanicDmgTakenPct(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5777{
5778 if (apply)
5779 m_target->m_modDamageTakenByMechPct[aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()] += (float)aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100;
5780
5781 else
5782 m_target->m_modDamageTakenByMechPct[aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()] -= (float)aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100;
5783}
5784
5785void Aura::SpellAuraAllowOnlyAbility(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
5786{
5787 // cannot perform any abilities, currently only works on players
5788 if (!p_target)
5789 return;
5790
5791#if VERSION_STRING >= WotLK
5792 // Generic
5793 if (apply)
5794 {
5795 p_target->addPlayerFlags(PLAYER_FLAG_PREVENT_SPELL_CAST);
5796 }
5797 else
5798 {
5799 p_target->removePlayerFlags(PLAYER_FLAG_PREVENT_SPELL_CAST);
5800 }
5801#endif
5802}
5803
5804void Aura::SpellAuraIncreaseAPbyStatPct(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5805{
5806 if (apply)
5807 {
5808 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0)
5809 mPositive = true;
5810 else
5811 mPositive = false;
5812
5813 uint8_t modValue = static_cast<uint8_t>(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue());
5814
5815 aurEff->setEffectFixedDamage(m_target->getStat(modValue) * aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100);
5816 m_target->modAttackPowerMods(aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
5817 }
5818 else
5819 m_target->modAttackPowerMods(-aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
5820
5821 m_target->calculateDamage();
5822}
5823
5824void Aura::SpellAuraModSpellDamageDOTPct(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5825{
5826 int32_t val = (apply) ? aurEff->getEffectDamage() : -aurEff->getEffectDamage();
5827
5828 switch (m_spellInfo->getId())
5829 {
5830 //SPELL_HASH_HAUNT
5831 case 48181:
5832 case 48184:
5833 case 48210:
5834 case 50091:
5835 case 59161:
5836 case 59163:
5837 case 59164:
5838 m_target->m_DoTPctIncrease[m_spellInfo->getFirstSchoolFromSchoolMask()] += val;
5839 break;
5840 default:
5841 {
5842 for (uint32_t x = 0; x < 7; x++)
5843 {
5844 if (aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() & (((uint32_t)1) << x))
5845 {
5846 m_target->m_DoTPctIncrease[x] += val;
5847 }
5848 }
5849 } break;
5850 }
5851}
5852
5853void Aura::SpellAuraConsumeNoAmmo(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
5854{
5855 if (p_target == nullptr)
5856 return;
5857
5858 if (apply)
5859 {
5860 p_target->m_requiresNoAmmo = true;
5861 }
5862 else
5863 {
5864 bool other = false;
5865
5866#if VERSION_STRING >= WotLK
5867 switch (m_spellInfo->getId())
5868 {
5869 //SPELL_HASH_REQUIRES_NO_AMMO
5870 case 46699:
5871 {
5872 // We are unequipping Thori'dal but have an aura with no ammo consumption effect
5873 if (p_target->hasAuraWithAuraEffect(SPELL_AURA_CONSUMES_NO_AMMO))
5874 other = true;
5875 } break;
5876
5877 default:
5878 {
5879#endif
5880 // we have Thori'dal too
5881 if (m_spellInfo->getId() != 46699 && p_target->getAuraWithId(46699))
5882 other = true;
5883#if VERSION_STRING >= WotLK
5884 }
5885 }
5886#endif
5887
5888#if VERSION_STRING >= WotLK
5889 // We have more than 1 aura with no ammo consumption effect
5890 if (p_target->getAuraCountForEffect(SPELL_AURA_CONSUMES_NO_AMMO) >= 2)
5891 other = true;
5892#endif
5893
5894 p_target->m_requiresNoAmmo = other;
5895 }
5896}
5897
5898void Aura::SpellAuraModIgnoreArmorPct(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5899{
5900 switch (getSpellInfo()->getId())
5901 {
5902 case 5530:
5903 case 12284:
5904 case 12701:
5905 case 12702:
5906 case 12703:
5907 case 12704:
5908 case 13709:
5909 case 13800:
5910 case 13801:
5911 case 13802:
5912 case 13803:
5913 case 20864:
5914 case 59224:
5915 {
5916 if (apply)
5917 m_target->m_ignoreArmorPctMaceSpec += (aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100.0f);
5918 else
5919 m_target->m_ignoreArmorPctMaceSpec -= (aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100.0f);
5920 } break;
5921 default:
5922 {
5923 if (apply)
5924 m_target->m_ignoreArmorPct += (aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100.0f);
5925 else
5926 m_target->m_ignoreArmorPct -= (aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100.0f);
5927 } break;
5928 }
5929}
5930
5931void Aura::SpellAuraModBaseHealth(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5932{
5933 if (!p_target)
5934 return;
5935
5936 if (apply)
5937 aurEff->setEffectFixedDamage(p_target->getBaseHealth());
5938
5939 int32_t amt = aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage() * aurEff->getEffectDamage() / 100;
5940
5941 if (!apply)
5942 amt *= -1;
5943
5944 p_target->setHealthFromSpell(p_target->getHealthFromSpell() + amt);
5945 p_target->updateStats();
5946}
5947
5948void Aura::SpellAuraModAttackPowerOfArmor(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5949{
5950 /* Need more info about mods, currently it's only for armor
5951 uint32_t modifier;
5952 switch(aurEff->getEffectMiscValue()):
5953 {
5954 case 1: //Armor
5955 modifier = UNIT_FIELD_RESISTANCES;
5956 break;
5957 }
5958 */
5959
5960 if (apply)
5961 {
5962 if (aurEff->getEffectDamage() > 0)
5963 mPositive = true;
5964 else
5965 mPositive = false;
5966
5967 aurEff->setEffectFixedDamage(m_target->getResistance(SCHOOL_NORMAL) / aurEff->getEffectDamage());
5968 m_target->modAttackPowerMods(aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
5969 }
5970 else
5971 m_target->modAttackPowerMods(-aurEff->getEffectFixedDamage());
5972
5973 m_target->calculateDamage();
5974}
5975
5976void Aura::SpellAuraDeflectSpells(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool /*apply*/)
5977{
5978 //Currently used only by Detterence and handled in Spell::DidHit
5979}
5980
5981void Aura::SpellAuraPhase(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
5982{
5983#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC
5984 if (m_target->getAuraCountForId(SPELL_AURA_PHASE) > 1)
5985 {
5986 if (m_target->isPlayer())
5987 static_cast< Player* >(m_target)->getSession()->SystemMessage("You can have only one phase aura!");
5988 removeAura();
5989 return;
5990 }
5991#endif
5992
5993 if (apply)
5994 {
5995 if (m_target->isPlayer())
5996 static_cast<Player*>(m_target)->setPhase(PHASE_SET, m_spellInfo->getEffectMiscValue(aurEff->getEffectIndex()));
5997 else
5998 m_target->setPhase(PHASE_SET, m_spellInfo->getEffectMiscValue(aurEff->getEffectIndex()));
5999 }
6000 else
6001 {
6002 if (m_target->isPlayer())
6003 static_cast<Player*>(m_target)->setPhase(PHASE_RESET);
6004 else
6005 m_target->setPhase(PHASE_RESET);
6006 }
6007}
6008
6009void Aura::SpellAuraCallStabledPet(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
6010{
6011 if (apply)
6012 {
6013 Player* pcaster = GetPlayerCaster();
6014 if (pcaster != nullptr && pcaster->getClass() == HUNTER && pcaster->getSession() != nullptr)
6015 pcaster->getSession()->sendStabledPetList(0);
6016 }
6017}
6018
6019bool Aura::IsCombatStateAffecting()
6020{
6021 auto sp = m_spellInfo;
6022
6023 if (sp->appliesAreaAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE) ||
6024 sp->appliesAreaAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_DAMAGE_PERCENT) ||
6025 sp->appliesAreaAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_TRIGGER_SPELL) ||
6026 sp->appliesAreaAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_LEECH) ||
6027 sp->appliesAreaAura(SPELL_AURA_PERIODIC_MANA_LEECH))
6028 return true;
6029
6030 return false;
6031}
6032
6033bool Aura::IsInrange(float x1, float y1, float z1, Object* o, float square_r)
6034{
6035 float t;
6036 float r;
6037 t = x1 - o->GetPositionX();
6038 r = t * t;
6039 t = y1 - o->GetPositionY();
6040 r += t * t;
6041 t = z1 - o->GetPositionZ();
6042 r += t * t;
6043 return (r <= square_r);
6044}
6045
6046bool Aura::IsAreaAura() const
6047{
6048 auto sp = m_spellInfo;
6049
6050 if (sp->hasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_GROUP_AREA_AURA) ||
6051 sp->hasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_RAID_AREA_AURA) ||
6052 sp->hasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_PET_AREA_AURA) ||
6053 sp->hasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_FRIEND_AREA_AURA) ||
6054 sp->hasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_ENEMY_AREA_AURA)
6055#if VERSION_STRING >= TBC
6056 || sp->hasEffect(SPELL_EFFECT_APPLY_OWNER_AREA_AURA)
6057#endif
6058 )
6059 return true;
6060
6061 return false;
6062}
6063
6064void Aura::SpellAuraConvertRune(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
6065{
6066 if (p_target == nullptr || !p_target->isClassDeathKnight())
6067 return;
6068
6069 DeathKnight* dk = static_cast<DeathKnight*>(p_target);
6070
6071 if (apply)
6072 {
6073 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < MAX_RUNES; ++i)
6074 {
6075 if (dk->GetRuneType(i) == aurEff->getEffectMiscValue() && !dk->GetRuneIsUsed(i))
6076 {
6077 dk->ConvertRune(i, static_cast<uint8_t>(getSpellInfo()->getEffectMiscValueB(aurEff->getEffectIndex())));
6078 }
6079 }
6080 }
6081 else
6082 {
6083 for (uint8_t i = 0; i < MAX_RUNES; ++i)
6084 {
6085 if (dk->GetRuneType(i) == getSpellInfo()->getEffectMiscValueB(aurEff->getEffectIndex()))
6086 {
6087 dk->ConvertRune(i, dk->GetBaseRuneType(i));
6088 }
6089 }
6090 }
6091}
6092
6093void Aura::SpellAuraMirrorImage(AuraEffectModifier* aurEff, bool apply)
6094{
6095 if (m_target == nullptr || !m_target->isCreature())
6096 return;
6097
6098 if (apply && m_target->isSummon() && (m_target->getCreatedByGuid() == getCasterGuid()))
6099 {
6100 Summon* s = static_cast< Summon* >(m_target);
6101
6102 s->setDisplayId(s->getUnitOwner()->getDisplayId());
6103#if VERSION_STRING != Classic
6104 s->addUnitFlags2(UNIT_FLAG2_MIRROR_IMAGE);
6105#endif
6106 }
6107
6108 SpellAuraMirrorImage2(aurEff, apply);
6109}
6110
6111void Aura::SpellAuraMirrorImage2(AuraEffectModifier* /*aurEff*/, bool apply)
6112{
6113 if (m_target == nullptr)
6114 return;
6115
6116 if (apply && m_target->isSummon() && (m_target->getCreatedByGuid() == getCasterGuid()))
6117 {
6118 if (getCaster()->isPlayer())
6119 {
6120 Player* p = static_cast<Player*>(getCaster());
6121
6122 Item* item;
6123
6124 item = p->getItemInterface()->GetInventoryItem(EQUIPMENT_SLOT_MAINHAND);
6125 if (item != nullptr)
6126 m_target->setVirtualItemSlotId(0, item->getItemProperties()->ItemId);
6127
6128 item = p->getItemInterface()->GetInventoryItem(EQUIPMENT_SLOT_OFFHAND);
6129 if (item != nullptr)
6130 m_target->setVirtualItemSlotId(OFFHAND, item->getItemProperties()->ItemId);
6131 }
6132#if VERSION_STRING >= WotLK
6133 else if (getCaster()->isCreatureOrPlayer())
6134 {
6135 auto unit = static_cast<Unit*>(getCaster());
6136 m_target->setVirtualItemSlotId(MELEE, unit->getVirtualItemSlotId(MELEE));
6137 m_target->setVirtualItemSlotId(OFFHAND, unit->getVirtualItemSlotId(OFFHAND));
6138 m_target->setVirtualItemSlotId(RANGED, unit->getVirtualItemSlotId(RANGED));
6139 }
6140#endif
6141 }
6142}
